7591797Di2015UniqueSeparator        public static string getBetween(string source, string before, string after)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var regExp = new Regex(string.Format("{0}(?<needle>[^{0}{1}]+){1}",before,after));Di2015NewLine            var matches = regExp.Matches(source).Cast<Match>(). //here we use LINQ toDi2015NewLine                OrderBy(m => m.Groups["needle"].Value.Length).  //find shortest stringDi2015NewLine                Select(m => m.Groups["needle"].Value);          //you can use foreach loop insteadDi2015NewLine            return matches.FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

7604825Di2015UniqueSeparatorBufferWithInactivity
7604825Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IObservable<IEnumerable<T>> BufferWithInactivity<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IObservable<T> source,Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan inactivity,Di2015NewLine    int maximumBufferSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Observable.Create<IEnumerable<T>>(o =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var gate = new object();Di2015NewLine        var buffer = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        var mutable = new SerialDisposable();Di2015NewLine        var subscription = (IDisposable)null;Di2015NewLine        var scheduler = Scheduler.ThreadPool;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action dump = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var bts = buffer.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            buffer = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine            if (o != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                o.OnNext(bts);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action dispose = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (subscription != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                subscription.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            mutable.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<Action<IObserver<IEnumerable<T>>>> onErrorOrCompleted =Di2015NewLine            onAction =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (gate)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dispose();Di2015NewLine                    dump();Di2015NewLine                    if (o != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        onAction(o);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<Exception> onError = ex =>Di2015NewLine            onErrorOrCompleted(x => x.OnError(ex));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action onCompleted = () => 7607822Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GroupAdjacent<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<IEnumerable<T>, T, bool> adjacent)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var g = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var x in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (g.Count != 0 && !adjacent(g, x))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return g;Di2015NewLine            g = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        g.Add(x);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    yield return g;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7608261Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool IsStartupItem()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The path to the key where Windows looks for startup applicationsDi2015NewLine    RegistryKey rkApp = Registry.CurrentUser.OpenSubKey("SOFTWARE\\\\Microsoft\\\\Windows\\\\CurrentVersion\\\\Run", true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (rkApp.GetValue("My app's name") == null)Di2015NewLine        // The value doesn't exist, the application is not set to run at startupDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        // The value exists, the application is set to run at startupDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7611611Di2015UniqueSeparator        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This method constructs ellipsoid vertices, indices, and normals.Di2015NewLine        /// Equations are performed using the parameterized equations:Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// x = a cos(B)cos(L)Di2015NewLine        /// y = b cos(B)sin(L)Di2015NewLine        /// z = c sin(B)Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// Where:Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// B = latitude and,Di2015NewLine        /// L = longitudeDi2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <seealso cref="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ellipsoid">Wikipedia - Ellipsoid</seealso>Di2015NewLine        public override void BuildVertices()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            #region DeclarationsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int iIndex = 0;                                     // Stores the index of the vertex array.Di2015NewLine            int iBeta = 0;                                      // Stores the beta increment.Di2015NewLine            int iLambda = 0;                                    // Stores the lambda increment.Di2015NewLine            float Beta = 0.0f;                                  // Beta0 - Stores the latitude.Di2015NewLine            float Lambda = 0.0f;                                // Lambda0 - Stores the longitude.Di2015NewLine            float BetaStep = MathHelper.Pi / m_iSegments;       // Latitude Segements, in degrees.Di2015NewLine            float LambdaStep = MathHelper.TwoPi / m_iSegments;  // Longitude Segments, in degrees.Di2015NewLine            Vector3 vectPos = Vector3.Zero;                     // Vertex Position VectorDi2015NewLine            Vector3 vectNor = Vector3.Zero;                     // Vertex Normal VectorDi2015NewLine            Vector2 vectTex = Vector2.Zero;                     // Vertex Texture CoordinateDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #region Build the vertices.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int[] iIndices = new int[6 * m_iSegments * m_iSegments];Di2015NewLine            Vector3[] vVertices = new Vector3[(m_iSegments + 1) * (m_iSegments + 1)];Di2015NewLine            Vector2[] vTexCrds  = new Vector2[vVertices.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            iIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (iBeta = 0; iBeta <= m_iSegments; iBeta++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Compute the latitude.Di2015NewLine                Beta = MathHelper.Clamp((-MathHelper.PiOver2) + (iBeta * BetaStep), -MathHelper.PiOver2, MathHelper.PiOver2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (iLambda = 0; iLambda <= m_iSegments; iLambda++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Compute the current longitude.Di2015NewLine                    Lambda = MathHelper.Clamp((-MathHelper.Pi) + (iLambda * LambdaStep), -MathHelper.Pi, MathHelper.Pi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Compute the current vertex.Di2015NewLine                    vVertices[iIndex] = new Vector3((float)(Math.Cos(Beta) * Math.Sin(Lambda)),Di2015NewLine                                                    (float)(Math.Sin(Beta)),Di2015NewLine                                                    (float)(Math.Cos(Beta) * Math.Cos(Lambda)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Compute the triangle indices.Di2015NewLine                    if (iBeta < m_iSegments &&Di2015NewLine                        iLambda < m_iSegments)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        iIndices[iIndex + (iIndex * 5) - (iBeta * 6) + 0] = iIndex;Di2015NewLine                        iIndices[iIndex + (iIndex * 5) - (iBeta * 6) + 1] = iIndex + m_iSegments + 1;Di2015NewLine                        iIndices[iIndex + (iIndex * 5) - (iBeta * 6) + 2] = iIndex + m_iSegments + 2;Di2015NewLine                        iIndices[iIndex + (iIndex * 5) - (iBeta * 6) + 3] = iIndex;Di2015NewLine                        iIndices[iIndex + (iIndex * 5) - (iBeta * 6) + 4] = iIndex + m_iSegments + 2;Di2015NewLine                        iIndices[iIndex + (iIndex * 5) - (iBeta * 6) + 5] = iIndex + 1;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Compute the texture coordinates.Di2015NewLine                    vTexCrds[iIndex] = new Vector2((float)iLambda / (float)m_iSegments, 1.0f - (float)iBeta / (float)m_iSegments);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    iIndex++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            # endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #region Build the normals.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Vector3[] vNormals = new Vector3[vVertices.Length];Di2015NewLine            for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < vVertices.Length; iIndex++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                vNormals[iIndex] = vVertices[iIndex] - this.AbsolutePosition;Di2015NewLine                vNormals[iIndex].Normalize();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #region Build the buffers.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            VertexPositionNormalTexture[] vertices = new VertexPositionNormalTexture[vVertices.Length];Di2015NewLine            for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < vVertices.Length; iIndex++)Di2015NewLine                vertices[iIndex] = new VertexPositionNormalTexture(vVertices[iIndex], vNormals[iIndex], vTexCrds[iIndex]);Di2015NewLine            m_pAppearance.SetBuffers(vertices, iIndices);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            #endregionDi2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine

7613283Di2015UniqueSeparator@"^(\\d+([,.]\\d+)?-\\d+([,.]\\d+)?[ ;])+(?<=;)$"Di2015NewLine
7613283Di2015UniqueSeparator^              //Start of the string.Di2015NewLine(              //Start of group to be repeated. You can also use (?=Di2015NewLine\\d+            //One or more digits.Di2015NewLine([,.]\\d+)?     //With an optional decimalDi2015NewLine-              //Separated by a dashDi2015NewLine\\d+([,.]\\d+)?  //Same as before.Di2015NewLine[ ;]           //Terminated by a semi-colon or a spaceDi2015NewLine)+             //One or more of these groups.Di2015NewLine(?<=;)         //The last char before the end needs to be a semi-colonDi2015NewLine$              //End of string.Di2015NewLine

7613390Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Print(List<string> list)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var path = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLine    var count = new Stack<int>();Di2015NewLine    path.Push("");Di2015NewLine    count.Push(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    list.Sort(new Comparison<string>(UrlComparison));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var x in list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (!x.StartsWith(path.Peek())) { path.Pop(); count.Pop(); }Di2015NewLine        count.Push(count.Pop() + 1);Di2015NewLine        foreach(var n in count.Reverse()) Console.Write("{0}.", n);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(" {0}", x);Di2015NewLine        path.Push(x);Di2015NewLine        count.Push(0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7613390Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int UrlComparison(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (x == null && y == null) return 0;Di2015NewLine    if (x == null) return -1;Di2015NewLine    if (y == null) return 1;Di2015NewLine    for(int n = 0; n < Math.Min(x.Length, y.Length); n++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char cx = x[n], cy = y[n];Di2015NewLine        if(cx == cy) continue;Di2015NewLine        returnDi2015NewLine            (cx == '/' || cx == '.' || cx == '?') ? -1 :Di2015NewLine            (cy == '/' || cy == '.' || cy == '?') ? 1 :Di2015NewLine            (cx > cy) ? 1 : -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (x.Length == y.Length) ? 0 : (x.Length > y.Length) ? 1 : -1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7616235Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Sets a value in an object, used to hide all the logic that goes intoDi2015NewLine        ///     handling this sort of thing, so that is works elegantly in a single line.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="target"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="propertyName"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="propertyValue"></param>Di2015NewLine        public static void SetValueFromString(this object target, string propertyName, string propertyValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo oProp = target.GetType().GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine            Type tProp = oProp.PropertyType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Nullable properties have to be treated differently, since we Di2015NewLine            //  use their underlying property to set the value in the objectDi2015NewLine            if (tProp.IsGenericTypeDi2015NewLine                && tProp.GetGenericTypeDefinition().Equals(typeof(Nullable<>)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //if it's null, just set the value from the reserved word null, and returnDi2015NewLine                if (propertyValue == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    oProp.SetValue(target, null, null);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Get the underlying type property instead of the nullable genericDi2015NewLine                tProp = new NullableConverter(oProp.PropertyType).UnderlyingType;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //use the converter to get the correct valueDi2015NewLine            oProp.SetValue(target, Convert.ChangeType(propertyValue, tProp), null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

7619724Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<Owner> GetOwners(IEnumerable<Tuple<int, int>> filter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var q = (from o in ownersDi2015NewLine            join f in filter on Di2015NewLine               new {o.TypeId, o.TypeCodeId} equals Di2015NewLine               new {TypeId = f.Item1, TypeCodeId = f.Item2}Di2015NewLine            select o).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var dic = q.ToDictionary (o => new {o.OwnerId, o.TypeId}, o => o.TypeValue);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var o in q.Select(o => new { o.OwnerId, o.OwnerName }).Distinct())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var owner = new Owner()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OwnerId = o.OwnerId,Di2015NewLine            Name = o.OwnerNameDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        string lookup;Di2015NewLine        if(dic.TryGetValue(new {o.OwnerId, TypeId = 1}, out lookup))Di2015NewLine            owner.Area = lookup;Di2015NewLine        if(dic.TryGetValue(new {o.OwnerId, TypeId = 2}, out lookup))Di2015NewLine            owner.City = lookup;Di2015NewLine        if(dic.TryGetValue(new {o.OwnerId, TypeId = 3}, out lookup))Di2015NewLine            owner.Sex = lookup;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return owner;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7621080Di2015UniqueSeparator    class SimpleWaitPulseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      static readonly object _locker = new object();Di2015NewLine      static bool _go;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      static void Main()Di2015NewLine      {                                // The new thread will blockDi2015NewLine        new Thread (Work).Start();     // because _go==false.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();            // Wait for user to hit EnterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock (_locker)                 // Let's now wake up the thread byDi2015NewLine        {                              // setting _go=true and pulsing.Di2015NewLine          _go = true;Di2015NewLine          Monitor.Pulse (_locker);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      static void Work()Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        lock (_locker)Di2015NewLine          while (!_go)Di2015NewLine            Monitor.Wait (_locker);    // Lock is released while were waitingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine ("Woken!!!");Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7621695Di2015UniqueSeparator// Check if the tile is a slopeDi2015NewLineif (lv.type[lv.tile[x, y]] == Tiles.SLOPE)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create rectangle collision that is the same size as the tileDi2015NewLine    Rectangle tileCol = new Rectangle(x * lv.tileSize, y * lv.tileSize, lv.tileSize, lv.tileSize + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If player collision "col" standing on "tileCol"Di2015NewLine    if (col.Intersects(tileCol) && !onSlope)Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        // Get the angle of the tileDi2015NewLine        float angle = lv.angle[lv.tile[x, y]];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the x distance of how far away the player's right is inside the tileDi2015NewLine        float dist = col.Right - tileCol.X;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Figure out how far to offset the player Di2015NewLine        float offset = (float)(Math.Tan(MathHelper.ToRadians(angle)) * (dist));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If player's right is less then or equal to tile's rightDi2015NewLine        if (col.Right <= tileCol.Right)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (angle % 180 < 90)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pos.Y = tileCol.Bottom + offset;Di2015NewLine                onSlope = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (angle % 180 > 90)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pos.Y = tileCol.Top + offset;Di2015NewLine                onSlope = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7628058Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static String GetNext<T>(String colorName) where T : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     // Verify that T is actually an enum typeDi2015NewLine     if (!typeof(T).IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Type argument must be an enum type");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     T colorValue;Di2015NewLine     String colorNameOut = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if (Enum.TryParse<T>(colorName, out colorValue))Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        T initial = colorValue, next = colorValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = (Convert.ToInt32(initial)) + 1; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if (Enum.IsDefined(typeof(T), i))Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              next = (T)Enum.ToObject(typeof(T), i);Di2015NewLine              break;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           elseDi2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              next = (T)Enum.ToObject(typeof(T), 0);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        colorNameOut = next.ToString();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     return colorNameOut;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7628843Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Control> GetControlHierarchy(Control parent, string controlID)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (Control ctrl in parent.Controls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ctrl.ID == controlID)Di2015NewLine            yield return ctrl;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var result = GetControlHierarchy(ctrl, controlID);Di2015NewLine            if (result != null)Di2015NewLine                yield return ctrl;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7628972Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> TakeTopDistinct<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    if (count < 0) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("count");Di2015NewLine    if (count == 0) yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var comparer = Comparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLine    LinkedList<T> selected = new LinkedList<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var value in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(selected.Count < count // need to fillDi2015NewLine            || comparer.Compare(selected.Last.Value, value) < 0 // better candidateDi2015NewLine            )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var tmp = selected.First;Di2015NewLine            bool add = true;Di2015NewLine            while (tmp != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var delta = comparer.Compare(tmp.Value, value);Di2015NewLine                if (delta == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    add = false; // not distinctDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (delta < 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    selected.AddBefore(tmp, value);Di2015NewLine                    add = false;Di2015NewLine                    if(selected.Count > count) selected.RemoveLast();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                tmp = tmp.Next;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (add && selected.Count < count) selected.AddLast(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (var value in selected) yield return value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7636521Di2015UniqueSeparatoryield
7636521Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> SplitIntoSections<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Di2015NewLine    Func<T, bool> sectionDivider)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The items in the current group.Di2015NewLine    IList<T> currentGroup = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Cycle through the items.Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check to see if it is a section divider, ifDi2015NewLine        // it is, then return the previous section.Di2015NewLine        // Also, only return if there are items.Di2015NewLine        if (sectionDivider(item) && currentGroup.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Return the list.Di2015NewLine            yield return currentGroup;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Reset the list.Di2015NewLine            currentGroup = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the item to the list.Di2015NewLine        currentGroup.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If there are items in the list, yield it.Di2015NewLine    if (currentGroup.Count > 0) yield return currentGroup;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7637009Di2015UniqueSeparatorWordOpenXML
7637009Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml.XPath;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO.Packaging;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// [...]Di2015NewLine// Call like this: createPackageFromWordOpenXML(wordEditor.WordOpenXML, @"C:\\outputFiles\\testOut.docx");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Creates a ZIP package (ie. Word's .docx format) from a WordOpenXML string, which is saved to the file at the path specified.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="wordOpenXML">The WordOpenXML string to get the ZIP package data from.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="filePath">The path of the file to save the ZIP package to.</param>Di2015NewLineprivate void createPackageFromWordOpenXML(string wordOpenXML, string filePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string packageXmlns = "http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/2006/xmlPackage";Di2015NewLine    Package newPkg = System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage.Open(filePath, FileMode.Create);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XPathDocument xpDocument = new XPathDocument(new StringReader(wordOpenXML));Di2015NewLine        XPathNavigator xpNavigator = xpDocument.CreateNavigator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XmlNamespaceManager nsManager = new XmlNamespaceManager(xpNavigator.NameTable);Di2015NewLine        nsManager.AddNamespace("pkg", packageXmlns);Di2015NewLine        XPathNodeIterator xpIterator = xpNavigator.Select("//pkg:part", 7638465Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string rules = Di2015NewLine        "Check(Morning):Say(Good morning)|" +Di2015NewLine        "Check(Afternoon):Say(Good afternoon)|" +Di2015NewLine        "Check(Evening):Say(Good night)";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // next, you need some **object instances** which will Di2015NewLine    // provide a context for your "test" and "action" methods.Di2015NewLine    // you don't want to use static methods if youDi2015NewLine    // went through the pain of defining such an architecture!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // let's say that a "Tester" object has a "Check" method,Di2015NewLine    // and an "Executor" object has a "Say" method:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tester = new Tester("Afternoon");Di2015NewLine    var executor = new Executor();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // since I suck at regular expressions,Di2015NewLine    // I am using plain string methods to splitDi2015NewLine    // the expression into tokens. You might wantDi2015NewLine    // to add some validationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var rule in rules.Split('|'))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = Parse(rule, tester, executor);Di2015NewLine        if (result.TestPassed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Execute();Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7638465Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // returns true if a test is fulfilledDi2015NewLine    bool TestPassed { get; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // executes the related actionDi2015NewLine    void Execute();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7638465Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Result : IResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region IResult MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly Func<bool> _testMethod;Di2015NewLine    public bool TestPassedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _testMethod(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly Action _actionMethod;Di2015NewLine    public void Execute()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _actionMethod();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Result(Func<bool> testMethod, Action actionMethod)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _testMethod = testMethod;Di2015NewLine        _actionMethod = actionMethod;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7638465Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IResult Parse(string rule, object tester, object executor)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // split into test/actionDi2015NewLine    var tokens = rule.Split(':');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // extract the method/parameter part for each expressionDi2015NewLine    var test = GetMethodAndParams(tokens[0]);Di2015NewLine    var action = GetMethodAndParams(tokens[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // use reflection to find actual methodsDi2015NewLine    var testMethod = tester.GetType().GetMethod(test.Method);Di2015NewLine    var actionMethod = executor.GetType().GetMethod(action.Method);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // return delegates which will simply invoke these methodsDi2015NewLine    return new ResultDi2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        () => (bool)testMethod.Invoke(tester, new object[] { test.Param }),Di2015NewLine        () => actionMethod.Invoke(executor, new object[] { action.Param })Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7641314Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AsyncQueue<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object m_lock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool m_finishedAdding = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly Queue<T> m_overflowQueue = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly Queue<TaskCompletionSource<T>> m_underflowQueue =Di2015NewLine        new Queue<TaskCompletionSource<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsCompletedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return m_finishedAdding && m_overflowQueue.Count == 0; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Task<T> DequeueAsync()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Task<T> result;Di2015NewLine        lock (m_lock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_overflowQueue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                result = Task.FromResult(m_overflowQueue.Dequeue());Di2015NewLine            else if (!m_finishedAdding)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<T>();Di2015NewLine                m_underflowQueue.Enqueue(tcs);Di2015NewLine                result = tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Enqueue(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (m_lock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_finishedAdding)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (m_underflowQueue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var tcs = m_underflowQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                tcs.SetResult(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                m_overflowQueue.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void FinishAdding()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (m_lock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_finishedAdding = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (m_underflowQueue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var tcs = m_underflowQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                tcs.SetException(new InvalidOperationException());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7644045Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var cnk = comb(new [] {1,2,3},2);Di2015NewLine    foreach ( var c in cnk)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<int[]> comb(int[] a, int k)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (a == null || a.Length == 0 || k < 1 || k > a.Length)Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int n = a.Length;   Di2015NewLine    // 1Di2015NewLine    if ( k == 1)Di2015NewLine        for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine        {   Di2015NewLine            yield return new int[] {a[i]};Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // kDi2015NewLine            for ( int i = 0; i < n - k + 1; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var res = new int[k];Di2015NewLine                    for (int t = i, c = 0; t < i + k - 1; t++, c++)                 Di2015NewLine                        res[c] = a[t];              Di2015NewLine                for (int j = i + k - 1; j < n; j++)Di2015NewLine                {                                                               Di2015NewLine                    res[k-1] = a[j];                    Di2015NewLine                    yield return res;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7646882Di2015UniqueSeparator// counts range overlapsDi2015NewLineint counter = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// saves previous date to calculate midrange dateDi2015NewLineDateTime left = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get mid range datesDi2015NewLineIList<DateTime> dates = this.DateRangesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // select range starts and endsDi2015NewLine    .SelectMany(r => new[] {Di2015NewLine        new {Di2015NewLine            Date = r.From,Di2015NewLine            Counter = 1Di2015NewLine        },Di2015NewLine        new {Di2015NewLine            Date = r.To,Di2015NewLine            Counter = -1Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    })Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // order dates because they come out mixedDi2015NewLine    .OrderBy(o => o.Date)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // convert dates to ranges; when non-empty & non-zero wide get mid dateDi2015NewLine    .Select(o => {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // calculate middle date if range isn't empty and not zero wideDi2015NewLine        DateTime? result = null;Di2015NewLine        if ((counter != 0) && (left != o.Date))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = o.Date.AddTicks(new DateTime((o.Date.Ticks - left.Ticks) / 2).Ticks);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // prepare for next date rangeDi2015NewLine        left = o.Date;Di2015NewLine        counter += o.Counter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // return middle date when applicable otherwise nullDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    })Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // exclude empty and zero width rangesDi2015NewLine    .Where(d => d.HasValue)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // collect non nullable datesDi2015NewLine    .Select(d => d.Value)Di2015NewLine    .ToList();Di2015NewLine

7650081Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T GetVerifiedValue<T>(this IDataRecord record, int index)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object value = record[index];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value == null || value.Equals(DBNull.Value))Di2015NewLine        return default(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //This handles nullable values, because sometimes there is a need forDi2015NewLine    //a casting on the underlying value before the final castDi2015NewLine    Type nullableUnderlyingType = Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (nullableUnderlyingType != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (nullableUnderlyingType.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine            return (T)Enum.ToObject(nullableUnderlyingType, value);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return (T)Convert.ChangeType(value, nullableUnderlyingType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Enums must be handled before the ValueTypes, becouseDi2015NewLine    //enums are also ValueTypes and using Convert.ChangeType with it will failDi2015NewLine    if (typeof(T).IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        return (T)Enum.ToObject(typeof(T), value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //######################################################################Di2015NewLine    //Here is the trick: as Convert.ChangeType returns an object,Di2015NewLine    //it is compatible with the unconstrained T. Worked nicely.Di2015NewLine    if (value is ValueType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ValueType structValue = (ValueType)value;Di2015NewLine        return (T)Convert.ChangeType(structValue, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //######################################################################Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value is string)Di2015NewLine        value = string.IsNullOrEmpty(value as string) ? null : value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (T)value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7651800Di2015UniqueSeparator        private bool Recycle(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ShowProgress(string.Format("Moving {0} to Recycle bin.", path));Di2015NewLine            SHFILEOPSTRUCT sfo = new SHFILEOPSTRUCT();Di2015NewLine            sfo.hwnd = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            sfo.wFunc = FO_DELETE;Di2015NewLine            sfo.fFlags = FOF_ALLOWUNDO | FOF_NOCONFIRMATION;Di2015NewLine            sfo.pFrom = path +'\\0' + '\\0';Di2015NewLine            sfo.pTo = null;Di2015NewLine            sfo.fAnyOperationsAborted = false;Di2015NewLine            sfo.hNameMappings = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine            sfo.lpszProgressTitle = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            int ret = SHFileOperation(ref sfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (ret == 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ShowProgress(string.Format("Failed to move {0} to Recycle bin.", path));Di2015NewLine            ShowProgress(ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // SHFileOperation wFunc and wFunc valuesDi2015NewLine    public const uint FO_MOVE = 0x0001;Di2015NewLine    public const uint FO_COPY = 0x0002;Di2015NewLine    public const uint FO_DELETE = 0x0003;Di2015NewLine    public const uint FO_RENAME = 0x0004;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_MULTIDESTFILES = 0x0001;Di2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_CONFIRMMOUSE = 0x0002;Di2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_SILENT = 0x0004; // don't create progress/reportDi2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_RENAMEONCOLLISION = 0x0008;Di2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_NOCONFIRMATION = 0x0010; // Don't prompt the user.Di2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_WANTMAPPINGHANDLE = 0x0020;// Fill in SHFILEOPSTRUCT.hNameMappingsDi2015NewLine                                                    // Must be freed using SHFreeNameMappingsDi2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_ALLOWUNDO = 0x0040;Di2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_FILESONLY = 0x0080;  // on *.*, do only filesDi2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_SIMPLEPROGRESS = 0x0100;  // means don't show names of filesDi2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_NOCONFIRMMKDIR = 0x0200;  // don't confirm making any needed dirsDi2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_NOERRORUI = 0x0400;  // don't put up error UIDi2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_NOCOPYSECURITYATTRIBS = 0x0800;  // dont copy NT file Security AttributesDi2015NewLine    public const ushort FOF_NORECURSION = 0x1000;  // don't recurse ushorto directories.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, CharSet=CharSet.Unicode)]Di2015NewLine    //If you use the above you may encounter an invalid memory access exception (when using ANSIDi2015NewLine    //or see nothing (when using unicode) when you use FOF_SIMPLEPROGRESS flag.Di2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, CharSet = CharSet.Unicode)]Di2015NewLine    public struct SHFILEOPSTRUCTDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public IntPtr hwnd;Di2015NewLine        public uint wFunc;Di2015NewLine        [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPWStr)]Di2015NewLine        public string pFrom;Di2015NewLine        [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPWStr)]Di2015NewLine        public string pTo;Di2015NewLine        public ushort fFlags;Di2015NewLine        [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLine        public bool fAnyOperationsAborted;Di2015NewLine        public IntPtr hNameMappings;Di2015NewLine        [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPWStr)]Di2015NewLine        public string lpszProgressTitle;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("ceshell.dll")]Di2015NewLine    public static extern int SHFileOperation([In] ref SHFILEOPSTRUCT lpFileOp);Di2015NewLine

7654629Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Loads own config file and compares its content to the settings, and adds missing entries with Di2015NewLine/// their default value to the file and saves it.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate void UpdateSettings()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Load .config fileDi2015NewLine  Configuration configFile = ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration(typeof(Settings).Assembly.Location);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Get the wanted sectionDi2015NewLine  ConfigurationSectionGroup sectionGroup = configFile.SectionGroups["applicationSettings"];Di2015NewLine  ClientSettingsSection clientSettings = (ClientSettingsSection)sectionGroup.Sections[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Make sure the section really is saved later onDi2015NewLine  clientSettings.SectionInformation.ForceSave = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Iterate through all propertiesDi2015NewLine  foreach (SettingsProperty property in Settings.Default.Properties)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // if any element in Settings equals the property's name we know that it exists in the fileDi2015NewLine    bool exists = clientSettings.Settings.Cast<SettingElement>().Any(element => element.Name == property.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create the SettingElement with the default value if the element happens to be not there.Di2015NewLine    if (!exists)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var element = new SettingElement(property.Name, property.SerializeAs);Di2015NewLine      var xElement = new XElement(XName.Get("value"));Di2015NewLine      XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine      XmlElement valueXml = doc.ReadNode(xElement.CreateReader()) as XmlElement;Di2015NewLine      valueXml.InnerText = property.DefaultValue.ToString();Di2015NewLine      element.Value.ValueXml = valueXml;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      clientSettings.Settings.Add(element);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Save configDi2015NewLine  configFile.Save();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7654890Di2015UniqueSeparatortcpListener.BeginAcceptTcpClient(AsyncCallback callback, object state);
7654890Di2015UniqueSeparatorEndAcceptTcpClient();
7654890Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void AcceptClient(TcpListener tcpListener)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Task<TcpClient> acceptTcpClientTask = Task.Factory.FromAsync<TcpClient>(tcpListener.BeginAcceptTcpClient, tcpListener.EndAcceptTcpClient, tcpListener);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This allows us to accept another connection without a loop.Di2015NewLine    // Because we are within the ThreadPool, this does not cause a stack overflow.Di2015NewLine    acceptTcpClientTask.ContinueWith(task => { OnAcceptConnection(task.Result); AcceptClient(tcpListener); }, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnRanToCompletion);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void OnAcceptConnection(TcpClient tcpClient)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string authority = tcpClient.Client.RemoteEndPoint.ToString(); // Format is: IP:PORTDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Start a new Task to handle client-server communicationDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7654890Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Read(State state)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The int return value is the amount of bytes read accessible through the Task's Result property.Di2015NewLine    Task<int> readTask = Task<int>.Factory.FromAsync(state.NetworkStream.BeginRead, state.NetworkStream.EndRead, state.Data, state.BytesRead, state.Data.Length - state.BytesRead, state, TaskCreationOptions.AttachedToParent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    readTask.ContinueWith(ReadPacket, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnRanToCompletion);Di2015NewLine    readTask.ContinueWith(ReadPacketError, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnFaulted);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ListProxy(IList<T> adaptee)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _adaptee = adaptee;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class MyProxyGenerator : RealProxyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type _Type;Di2015NewLine        object _Instance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static T Create<T>(object instance)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (T)new MyProxyGenerator(typeof(T),instance).GetTransparentProxy();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MyProxyGenerator(Type type,object instance) : base(type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _Type = type;Di2015NewLine            _Instance = instance.GetType().InvokeMember("get_Adaptee", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.InvokeMethod, null, instance, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override IMessage Invoke(IMessage msg)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IMethodCallMessage methodMessage = new MethodCallMessageWrapper((IMethodCallMessage)msg);Di2015NewLine            string method = (string)msg.Properties["__MethodName"];Di2015NewLine            object[] args = (object[])msg.Properties["__Args"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            object retObj = _Instance.GetType().InvokeMember(method, BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.InvokeMethod,null,_Instance,args);Di2015NewLine            return new ReturnMessage(retObj,methodMessage.Args,methodMessage.ArgCount,methodMessage.LogicalCallContext,methodMessage);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        set { _model.EmailAddress = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region LogicDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SaveChanges()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _model.Person.ChangedTimeStamp = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        _model.Person.ChangedBy = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If we have a valid home #, add itDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(HomePhoneNumber))Di2015NewLine            _model.HomePhone = HomePhoneNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If we have a valid cell #, add itDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(CellPhoneNumber))Di2015NewLine            _model.PersonalCell = CellPhoneNumber;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If we have a valid email, add itDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(EmailAddress))Di2015NewLine            _model.EmailAddress = EmailAddress;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Some fields may have 'not applicable'; blank themDi2015NewLine        _model.Person.SpecialNeedsDescription = _model.Person.SpecialNeedsDescription.NormalizeNotApplicable().NullIfEmptyOrWhitespace();Di2015NewLine        _model.Person.SpecialNeedsSummary = _model.Person.SpecialNeedsSummary.NormalizeNotApplicable().NullIfEmptyOrWhitespace();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Names of people should be proper case if they're all entered in lowercaseDi2015NewLine        _model.Person.FirstName = _model.Person.FirstName.NormalizeName();Di2015NewLine        _model.Person.LastName = _model.Person.LastName.NormalizeName();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (PictureData != null && (PictureAction == "replace" || (PictureAction ?? "") == ""))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Replace just adds, it does not remove the old picture.Di2015NewLine            Photo pic = PhotoHandling.GetPhotoEntityFromBytes(PictureData);Di2015NewLine            pic.ROWGUID = Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLine            pic.OrganizationID = _model.AuthUser.OrganizationID;Di2015NewLine            pic.CreationTimestamp = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            pic.Deleted = false;Di2015NewLine            _model.AddNewPhoto(pic);Di2015NewLine            _model.Person.Avatar = pic.ROWGUID;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (PictureAction == "remove" && _model.Person.Avatar.HasValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var pic = _model.Person.Photos.SingleOrDefault(p => p.ROWGUID == _model.Person.Avatar.Value);Di2015NewLine            if (pic != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pic.Deleted = true;Di2015NewLine                _model.Person.Avatar = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _model.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7663434Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Management
7663434Di2015UniqueSeparator    private bool SetAllowHybridSleep(bool enabled)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Machine to work on, "." for localDi2015NewLine        string RemotePC = ".";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Set the namespace to the power namespace, used throughout the functionDi2015NewLine        ManagementScope ms = new ManagementScope(@"\\\\" + RemotePC + @"\\root\\cimv2\\power");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Will hold each of our queriesDi2015NewLine        ObjectQuery oq = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Will hold the values of our power plan and the specific setting that we want to changeDi2015NewLine        Guid PowerPlanInstanceId = Guid.Empty;Di2015NewLine        string PowerSettingInstanceId = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Look for the specific setting that we wantDi2015NewLine        oq = new ObjectQuery(string.Format("SELECT * FROM Win32_PowerSetting WHERE ElementName = 'Allow hybrid sleep'"));Di2015NewLine        using (ManagementObjectSearcher mos = new ManagementObjectSearcher(ms, oq))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ManagementObjectCollection results = mos.Get();Di2015NewLine            foreach (ManagementObject obj in results)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (PropertyData p in obj.Properties)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (p.Name == "InstanceID")Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //This will give us a string with a GUID specific to our settingDi2015NewLine                        PowerSettingInstanceId = p.Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Sanity checkDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(PowerSettingInstanceId))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("System does not support hybrid sleep");Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Look for the active power schemeDi2015NewLine        oq = new ObjectQuery("SELECT * FROM Win32_PowerPlan WHERE IsActive=True");Di2015NewLine        using (ManagementObjectSearcher mos = new ManagementObjectSearcher(ms, oq))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ManagementObjectCollection results = mos.Get();Di2015NewLine            foreach (ManagementObject obj in results)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (PropertyData p in obj.Properties)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (p.Name == "InstanceID")Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //The instance contains a string with a GUID inside of it, use the code below to get the GUID by itselfDi2015NewLine                        if (!Guid.TryParse(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(p.Value.ToString(), @"\\{[0-9a-f]{8}\\-[0-9a-f]{4}\\-[0-9a-f]{4}\\-[0-9a-f]{4}\\-[0-9a-f]{12}\\}").Value, out PowerPlanInstanceId))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("Could not find active power plan");Di2015NewLine                            return false;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Now we need to update the actual power setting in the active planDi2015NewLine        //Get all power schemes for the target settingDi2015NewLine        oq = new ObjectQuery(string.Format("ASSOCIATORS OF {{Win32_PowerSetting.InstanceID=\\"{0}\\"}} WHERE ResultClass = Win32_PowerSettingDataIndex", PowerSettingInstanceId.Replace(@"\\", @"\\\\")));Di2015NewLine        using (ManagementObjectSearcher mos = new ManagementObjectSearcher(ms, oq))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ManagementObjectCollection results = mos.Get();Di2015NewLine            foreach (ManagementObject obj in results)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (PropertyData p in obj.Properties)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //See if the current scheme is the current setting. This will happen twice, once for AC and once for DCDi2015NewLine                    if (p.Name == "InstanceID" && p.Value.ToString().Contains(PowerPlanInstanceId.ToString()))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Change the value of the current settingDi2015NewLine                        obj.SetPropertyValue("SettingIndexValue", (enabled ? "1" : "0"));Di2015NewLine                        obj.Put();Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7673875Di2015UniqueSeparatorHashSet<int> hs = new HashSet<int>(); // In common with all the threadsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint id = 1; // Your idDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This is the body of your Thread. You pass it the id as you want. Di2015NewLine// A closure on it, or as a parameter of the thread.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This will begin with short spins, every time trying to add the id to the hashset.Di2015NewLine// SpinUntil stops when the lambda function returns true.Di2015NewLineSpinWait.SpinUntil(() =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (cd)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return hs.Add(id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// OR, if you know the operation is slow, or < .NET 4.0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This is clearer. The thread yields until it can add the id to the hashset.Di2015NewLinewhile (true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (hs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (hs.Add(id))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Thread.Yield();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// End of the variantDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Remember the try/finally! It's important in case of exceptions!!!Di2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Put here your codeDi2015NewLine    // Put here your codeDi2015NewLine    // Put here your codeDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinefinallyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (hs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hs.Remove(id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7676328Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Intercept(IInvocation invocation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (TimedLock.Lock(monitor))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            state.ProtectedCodeIsAboutToBeCalled(); /* only throws an exception when state is Open, otherwise, it doesn't do anything. */Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            invocation.Proceed(); /* tells the interceptor to call the 'actual' method for the class that's being proxied.*/Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (TimedLock.Lock(monitor))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                failures++; /* increments the shared error count */Di2015NewLine                state.ActUponException(e); /* only implemented in the ClosedState class, so it changes the state to Open if the error count is at it's threshold. */ Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (TimedLock.Lock(monitor))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            state.ProtectedCodeHasBeenCalled(); /* only implemented in HalfOpen, if it succeeds the "switch" is thrown in the closed position */Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7683056Di2015UniqueSeparator// Action for a given struct that writes each field to a BinaryWriterDi2015NewLinestatic Action<BinaryWriter, T> CreateWriter<T>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // TODO: cache/validate T is a "simple" structDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var bw = Expression.Parameter(typeof(BinaryWriter), "bw");Di2015NewLine    var obj = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // I could not determine if .Net for Metro had BlockExpression or notDi2015NewLine    // and if it does not you'll need a shim that returns a dummy valueDi2015NewLine    // to compose with addition or boolean operationsDi2015NewLine    var body = Expression.Block(Di2015NewLine       from f in typeof(T).GetTypeInfo().DeclaredFieldsDi2015NewLine       select Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine           bw,Di2015NewLine           "Write",Di2015NewLine           Type.EmptyTypes, // Not a generic methodDi2015NewLine           new[] { Expression.Field(obj, f.Name) }));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var action = Expression.Lambda<Action<BinaryWriter, T>>(Di2015NewLine        body,Di2015NewLine        new[] { bw, obj });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return action.Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7683056Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] GetBytes<T>(T value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // TODO: validation and caching as necessaryDi2015NewLine    var writer = CreateWriter(value);Di2015NewLine    var memory = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    writer(new BinaryWriter(memory), value);Di2015NewLine    return memory.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7683056Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic MethodInfo[] readers = typeof(BinaryReader).GetTypeInfo()Di2015NewLine    .DeclaredMethodsDi2015NewLine    .Where(m => m.Name.StartsWith("Read") && !m.GetParameters().Any())Di2015NewLine    .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Action for a given struct that reads each field from a BinaryReaderDi2015NewLinestatic Func<BinaryReader, T> CreateReader<T>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // TODO: cache/validate T is a "simple" structDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var br = Expression.Parameter(typeof(BinaryReader), "br");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var info = typeof(T).GetTypeInfo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var body = Expression.MemberInit(Di2015NewLine       Expression.New(typeof(T)),Di2015NewLine       from f in info.DeclaredFieldsDi2015NewLine       select Expression.Bind(Di2015NewLine           f,Di2015NewLine           Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine               br,Di2015NewLine               readers.Single(m => m.ReturnType == f.FieldType),Di2015NewLine               Type.EmptyTypes, // Not a generic methodDi2015NewLine               new Expression[0]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var function = Expression.Lambda<Func<BinaryReader, T>>(Di2015NewLine        body,Di2015NewLine        new[] { br });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return function.Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7688410Di2015UniqueSeparator//Using System.Diagnostics, set up a Stopwatch to time the executionDi2015NewLineStopwatch stopWatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLinestopWatch.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//convert your post data into a byte array... we're dealing with streams hereDi2015NewLinebyte[] postData = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes( postData );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//We're using the WebRequest object found in System.Net to do our work for usDi2015NewLineWebRequest request = WebRequest.Create( url );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Set all your headersDi2015NewLinerequest.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLinerequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLinerequest.ContentLength = postData.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//set up your request stream and write out your post dataDi2015NewLineStream stream = request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLinestream.Write( postData, 0, postData.Length );Di2015NewLinestream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Send the data and wait for a response. [blocking operation]Di2015NewLineWebResponse response = request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Once you reach this line, the server has finished doing it's work, Di2015NewLine//and downloading has commencedDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine( "First Response: {0}", stopWatch.Elapsed );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Start timing the download, wouldn't it be nice is there was a restart method? (.Net 4.0)Di2015NewLinestopWatch.Reset();Di2015NewLinestopWatch.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//We want to receive the data. so ask for the response streamDi2015NewLineStream reponseStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//In my case, there are megabytes of information, so the console is no good,Di2015NewLine//I'll store it in a file.Di2015NewLineFileStream fileStream = File.Open( "result.txt", FileMode.OpenOrCreate );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//create a buffer to collect data as it is downloadedDi2015NewLinebyte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//This loop will run as long as the responseStream can read data. (i.e. downloading data)Di2015NewLine//Once it reads 0... the downloading has completedDi2015NewLineint resultLength;Di2015NewLinewhile( ( resultLength = reponseStream.Read( buffer, 0, buffer.Length ) ) != 0 )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //You could further measure progress here... but I don't care.Di2015NewLine    fileStream.Write( buffer, 0, resultLength );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Everything is done... how long did it take to download?Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine( "Download Complete: {0}", stopWatch.Elapsed );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//housekeepingDi2015NewLinefileStream.Flush();Di2015NewLinefileStream.Close();Di2015NewLinestopWatch.Stop();Di2015NewLine

7688965Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text.pdf;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WindowsFormsApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Form1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Form1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Test file nameDi2015NewLine            string TestFile = Path.Combine(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop), "Test.pdf");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Standard iTextSharp setupDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(TestFile, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (Document doc = new Document(PageSize.LETTER))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (PdfWriter w = PdfWriter.GetInstance(doc, fs))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Open the document for writingDi2015NewLine                        doc.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Create a shading object. The (x,y)'s appear to be document-level instead of cell-level so they need to be played withDi2015NewLine                        PdfShading shading = PdfShading.SimpleAxial(w, 0, 700, 300, 700, BaseColor.BLUE, BaseColor.RED);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Create a pattern from our shading objectDi2015NewLine                        PdfShadingPattern pattern = new PdfShadingPattern(shading);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Create a color from our patterDi2015NewLine                        ShadingColor color = new ShadingColor(pattern);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Create a standard two column tableDi2015NewLine                        PdfPTable t = new PdfPTable(2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Add a text cell setting the background color through object initializationDi2015NewLine                        t.AddCell(new PdfPCell(new Phrase("Hello")) { BackgroundColor = color });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Add another cell with everything inline. Notice that the (x,y)'s have been updatedDi2015NewLine                        t.AddCell(new PdfPCell(new Phrase("World")) { BackgroundColor = new ShadingColor(new PdfShadingPattern(PdfShading.SimpleAxial(w, 400, 700, 600, 700, BaseColor.PINK, BaseColor.CYAN))) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Add the table to the documentDi2015NewLine                        doc.Add(t);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Close the documentDi2015NewLine                        doc.Close();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7689095Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication37 {Di2015NewLine  public static class Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine      var numList=new[] {1, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 12};Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(numListToPossiblyDegenerateRanges(numList).Select(r => PrettyRange(r)).Intersperse(","));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// e.g. 1,3,5,6,7,8,9,10,12Di2015NewLine    /// becomesDi2015NewLine    /// (1,1),(3,3),(5,10),(12,12)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<Tuple<int,int>> numListToPossiblyDegenerateRanges(IEnumerable<int> numList) {Di2015NewLine      Tuple<int, int> currentRange=null;Di2015NewLine      foreach(var num in numList) {Di2015NewLine        if(currentRange==null) {Di2015NewLine          currentRange=Tuple.Create(num, num);Di2015NewLine        } else if(currentRange.Item2==num-1) {Di2015NewLine          currentRange=Tuple.Create(currentRange.Item1, num);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine          yield return currentRange;Di2015NewLine          currentRange=Tuple.Create(num, num);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      if(currentRange!=null) {Di2015NewLine        yield return currentRange;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// e.g. (1,1) becomes "1"Di2015NewLine    /// (1,3) becomes "1-3"Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="range"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string PrettyRange(Tuple<int,int> range) {Di2015NewLine      if(range.Item1==range.Item2) {Di2015NewLine        return range.Item1.ToString();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return string.Format("{0}-{1}", range.Item1, range.Item2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Intersperse(this IEnumerable<string> items, string interspersand) {Di2015NewLine      var currentInterspersand="";Di2015NewLine      var result=new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine      foreach(var item in items) {Di2015NewLine        result.Append(currentInterspersand);Di2015NewLine        result.Append(item);Di2015NewLine        currentInterspersand=interspersand;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7689815Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Enum GetSensorTypeAtLocation(int x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   ...Di2015NewLine   // Send serial command and receive response.Di2015NewLine   string responseCommand = SendReceive(String.Format("SR,ML,{0},\\r", x));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Try to parse the response into a value from one of the enums;Di2015NewLine   //the first one that succeeds is our sensor type.Di2015NewLine   SensorTypeA typeAresult;Di2015NewLine   if(Enum.TryParse(responseCommand, typeAResult)) return typeAresult;Di2015NewLine   SensorTypeB typeBresult;Di2015NewLine   if(Enum.TryParse(responseCommand, typeBResult)) return typeBresult;Di2015NewLine   SensorTypeC typeCresult;Di2015NewLine   if(Enum.TryParse(responseCommand, typeCResult)) return typeCresult;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7689815Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic SensorType GetSensorTypeAtLocation(int x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   ...Di2015NewLine   // Send serial command and receive response.Di2015NewLine   string responseCommand = SendReceive(String.Format("SR,ML,{0},\\r", x));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Process response command string and return result.Di2015NewLine   SensorTypeA typeAresult;Di2015NewLine   if(Enum.TryParse(responseCommand, typeAResult)) return SensorType.A;Di2015NewLine   SensorTypeB typeBresult;Di2015NewLine   if(Enum.TryParse(responseCommand, typeBResult)) return SensorType.B;Di2015NewLine   SensorTypeC typeCresult;Di2015NewLine   if(Enum.TryParse(responseCommand, typeCResult)) return SensorType.C;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7694661Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Transaction(string transDate, IEnumerable<T> items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DateTime tmpDate = DateTime.Parse(transDate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var deposits = from t in App.ViewModel.AllTransactionsDi2015NewLine                        where t.TransDate <= new DateTime(tmpDate.Year, tmpDate.Month, tmpDate.Day, 23, 59, 59, 999)Di2015NewLine                        where t.TransType == (int)TransType.DepositDi2015NewLine                        select t.TransAmount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var withdrawals = from t in App.ViewModel.AllTransactionsDi2015NewLine                        where t.TransDate <= new DateTime(tmpDate.Year, tmpDate.Month, tmpDate.Day, 23, 59, 59, 999)Di2015NewLine                        where t.TransType == (int)TransType.WithdrawalDi2015NewLine                        select t.TransAmount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    decimal total = (deposits.Sum() - withdrawals.Sum());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.TransAmount = total;Di2015NewLine    this.TransDate = transDate;Di2015NewLine    this.Items = new List<T>(items);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7696487Di2015UniqueSeparator        public override bool Equals( object obj )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Entity<TId> other = obj as Entity<TId>;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if( other == null || this.GetType() != other.GetType() )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool otherIsTransient = Equals (other.Id, default(TId));Di2015NewLine            bool thisIsTransient = Equals (this.Id, default (TId));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if( otherIsTransient && thisIsTransient )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return ReferenceEquals (this, other);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Id.Equals (other.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
7696487Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEquality<T>
7696487Di2015UniqueSeparator        private int? _oldHashCode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Once we have a hash code we'll never change itDi2015NewLine            if( _oldHashCode.HasValue )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return _oldHashCode.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool thisIsTransient = Equals (Id, default(TId));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // When this instance is transient, we use the base GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine            // and remember it, so an instance can NEVER change its hash code.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if( thisIsTransient )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _oldHashCode = base.GetHashCode ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return _oldHashCode.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Id.GetHashCode ();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

7697583Di2015UniqueSeparatorMyMatlab.cs
7697583Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing MathWorks.MATLAB.NET.Arrays;Di2015NewLinenamespace MyHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Collection of chained classes to make Matlab access easier.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static class MyMatlabDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns a double in a format that can be passed into Matlab.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="toMatlab">Double to convert into a form we can pass into Matlab.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A double in Matlab format.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static MWNumericArray MyToMatlab(this double toMatlab)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new MWNumericArray(toMatlab);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Converts an array that contains a single Matlab return parameter back into a .NET double.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="toDouble">MWArray variable, returned from Matlab code.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>.NET double.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static double MyToDouble(this MWArray toDouble)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var matNumericArray = (MWNumericArray)toDouble;Di2015NewLine            return matNumericArray.ToScalarDouble();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Converts an array that contains multiple Matlab return parameters back into a list of .NET doubles.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="toList">MWArray variable, returned from Matlab code.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>List of .NET doubles.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static List<double> MyToDoubleList(this MWArray toList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var matNumericArray = toList;Di2015NewLine            var netArray = (MWNumericArray)matNumericArray.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var result = new List<double>();Di2015NewLine            // Console.Write("{0}", netArray[1]);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i <= netArray.NumberOfElements; i++) // Matlab arrays are 1-based, thus the odd indexing.Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Add(netArray[i].ToScalarDouble());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Converts an array that contains multiple Matlab return parameters back into a list of .NET ints.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="toList">MWArray variable, returned from Matlab code.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>List of .NET ints.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static List<int> MyToMWNumericArray(this MWArray toList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var matNumericArray = toList;Di2015NewLine            var netArray = (MWNumericArray)matNumericArray.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var result = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine            // Console.Write("{0}", netArray[1]);Di2015NewLine            for result.Add(netArray[i].ToScalarInteger());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Converts an some type.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static T[] MyToArray<T>(this List<T> toArray)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var copy = new T[toArray.Count];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < toArray.Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine                copy[i] = toArray[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return copy;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        static 7700622Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing(DbEntities db = new DbEntities())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var fromDate = new DateTime(2011,8,1);Di2015NewLine  var toDate = new DateTime(2011,8,31);Di2015NewLine  var dictionary =Di2015NewLine            (from t1 in db.TABLE1Di2015NewLine            join t2 in db.TABLE2.Where(x => x.VALUE == 1 && x.DATE >= fromDate && x.DATE <= toDate)Di2015NewLine            on t1.NAME_ID equals t2.NAME_ID into t2_jDi2015NewLine            from t2s in t2_j.DefaultIfEmpty()Di2015NewLine            group t2s by t1.NAME into groupedDi2015NewLine            select new { Name = grouped.Key, Count = grouped.Sum(x => x.VALUE) }).Di2015NewLine            Where(x => x.Count.HasValue).Di2015NewLine            ToDictionary(o => o.Name,o => o.Count);Di2015NewLine   return dictionary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7701580Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string CleanBadwordsFromString(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var badWords =Di2015NewLine        "bunch,of,words,that,do,not,need,to,be,seen"Di2015NewLine            .Split(',').Select(w => w.ToLowerInvariant()).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var query =Di2015NewLine        from i in Enumerable.Range(0, text.Length)Di2015NewLine        let rl = text.Length - iDi2015NewLine        from bw in badWordsDi2015NewLine        let part = textDi2015NewLine            .Substring(i, Math.Min(rl, bw.Length))Di2015NewLine        where bw == part.ToLowerInvariant()Di2015NewLine        select newDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Index = i,Di2015NewLine            Replacement = partDi2015NewLine                .Substring(0, 1)Di2015NewLine                .PadRight(part.Length, '*')Di2015NewLine                .ToCharArray(),Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var textChars = text.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var x in query)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(Di2015NewLine            x.Replacement, 0,Di2015NewLine            textChars, x.Index, x.Replacement.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new String(textChars);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7703462Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class MainPage : UserControl {Di2015NewLine    PointCollection pc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int cnt = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int distance = 10; // line lengthDi2015NewLine    int steps = 1024; // number of paintsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int x = 0;Di2015NewLine    int y = 0;Di2015NewLine    int a = 90;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MainPage() {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void btnFire_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x = (int)(canvas.ActualWidth / 3);Di2015NewLine        y = (int)(canvas.ActualHeight / 1.5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pc = new PointCollection();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        draw(getS(steps));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Polyline p = new Polyline();Di2015NewLine        p.Stroke = new SolidColorBrush(Colors.Red);Di2015NewLine        p.StrokeThickness = 0.5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p.Points = pc;Di2015NewLine        canvas.Children.Add(p);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<bool> getS(int n) {Di2015NewLine        List<bool> s1 = new List<bool>();Di2015NewLine        while (n-- > 0) {Di2015NewLine            s1.Add(getNext());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return s1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void draw(List<bool> s) {Di2015NewLine        pc.Add(new Point(x, y));Di2015NewLine        foreach (bool z in s) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            a = (a + (z ? 90 : 270)) % 360;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // new targetDi2015NewLine            switch (a) {Di2015NewLine                case 90: x += distance; break;Di2015NewLine                case 180: y += distance; break;Di2015NewLine                case 270: x -= distance; break;Di2015NewLine                default: y -= distance; break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // moveDi2015NewLine            pc.Add(new Point(x, y));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool getNext() {Di2015NewLine        cnt++;Di2015NewLine        return (cnt & ((cnt & -cnt) << 1)) != 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
