7706303Di2015UniqueSeparator        IEnumerable<TutorCommission> tutorsCommissions =Di2015NewLine            from enrollment in enrollments // Take the enrollmentsDi2015NewLine            join tutorsCommissionPercentage in tutorCommissionPercentages // Join with the tutor's commission percentages.Di2015NewLine                on enrollment.TutorNoID equals tutorsCommissionPercentage.TutorNoIDDi2015NewLine            group enrollment by new { enrollment.TutorNoID, tutorsCommissionPercentage.CommissionPercentage } into enrollmentsAndCommissionByTutor // group enrollments and commission by the tutorDi2015NewLine            select new TutorCommissionDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TutorNoID = enrollmentsAndCommissionByTutor.Key.TutorNoID, // the grouping which is the tutorDi2015NewLine                CommissionAmount = (long) enrollmentsAndCommissionByTutor.Sum(e => e.MonthlyFee * enrollmentsAndCommissionByTutor.Key.CommissionPercentage)Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine

set; }Di2015NewLine        public Control Control { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<HeaderDropdownArgs> HeaderDropdown;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SetHeaderDropdown(int column, bool enable) {Di2015NewLine        if (column < 0 || column >= this.Columns.Count) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("column");Di2015NewLine        while (HeaderDropdowns.Count < this.Columns.Count) HeaderDropdowns.Add(false);Di2015NewLine        HeaderDropdowns[column] = enable;Di2015NewLine        if (this.IsHandleCreated) SetDropdown(column, enable);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected void OnHeaderDropdown(int column) {Di2015NewLine        var handler = HeaderDropdown;Di2015NewLine        if (handler == null) return;Di2015NewLine        var args = new HeaderDropdownArgs() { Column = column };Di2015NewLine        handler(this, args);Di2015NewLine        if (args.Control == null) return;Di2015NewLine        var frm = new Form();Di2015NewLine        frm.FormBorderStyle = FormBorderStyle.FixedSingle;Di2015NewLine        frm.ShowInTaskbar = false;Di2015NewLine        frm.ControlBox = false;Di2015NewLine        args.Control.Location = Point.Empty;Di2015NewLine        frm.Controls.Add(args.Control);Di2015NewLine        frm.Load += delegate { frm.MinimumSize = new Size(1, 1);  frm.Size = frm.Controls[0].Size; };Di2015NewLine        frm.Deactivate += delegate { frm.Dispose(); };Di2015NewLine        frm.StartPosition = FormStartPosition.Manual;Di2015NewLine        var rc = GetHeaderRect(column);Di2015NewLine        frm.Location = this.PointToScreen(new Point(rc.Right - SystemInformation.MenuButtonSize.Width, rc.Bottom));Di2015NewLine        frm.Show(this.FindForm());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnHandleCreated(EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        base.OnHandleCreated(e);Di2015NewLine        if (this.Columns.Count == 0 || Environment.OSVersion.Version.Major < 6 || HeaderDropdowns == null) return;Di2015NewLine        for (int col = 0; col < HeaderDropdowns.Count; ++col) {Di2015NewLine            if (HeaderDropdowns[col]) SetDropdown(col, true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Rectangle GetHeaderRect(int column) {Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hHeader = SendMessage(this.Handle, LVM_GETHEADER, IntPtr.Zero, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine        RECT rc;Di2015NewLine        SendMessage(hHeader, HDM_GETITEMRECT, (IntPtr)column, out rc);Di2015NewLine        return new Rectangle(rc.left, rc.top, rc.right - rc.left, rc.bottom - rc.top);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetDropdown(int column, bool enable) {Di2015NewLine        LVCOLUMN lvc = new LVCOLUMN();Di2015NewLine        lvc.mask = LVCF_FMT;Di2015NewLine        lvc.fmt = enable ? LVCFMT_SPLITBUTTON : 0;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr res = SendMessage(this.Handle, LVM_SETCOLUMN, (IntPtr)column, ref lvc);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void WndProc(ref Message m) {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(m);Di2015NewLine        if (m.Msg == WM_NOTIFY) {Di2015NewLine            var hdr = (NMHDR)Marshal.PtrToStructure(m.LParam, typeof(NMHDR));Di2015NewLine            if (hdr.code == LVN_COLUMNDROPDOWN) {Di2015NewLine                var info = (NMLISTVIEW)Marshal.PtrToStructure(m.LParam, typeof(NMLISTVIEW));Di2015NewLine                OnHeaderDropdown(info.iSubItem);Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<bool> HeaderDropdowns = new List<bool>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // PinvokeDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern IntPtr SendMessage(IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wp, IntPtr lp);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern IntPtr SendMessage(IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wp, ref LVCOLUMN lvc);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern IntPtr SendMessage(IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wp, out RECT rc);Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern IntPtr SetParent(IntPtr hWnd, IntPtr hParent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const int LVM_SETCOLUMN = 0x1000 + 96;Di2015NewLine    private const int LVCF_FMT = 1;Di2015NewLine    private const int LVCFMT_SPLITBUTTON = 0x1000000;Di2015NewLine    private const int WM_NOTIFY = 0x204e;Di2015NewLine    private const int LVN_COLUMNDROPDOWN = -100 - 7709854Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEqualityComparer<FooAttribute>
7709854Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass FooAttributeComparer : IEqualityComparer<FooAttribute>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(FooAttribute x, FooAttribute y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x.Match(y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(FooAttribute obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine        // This makes lookups complexity O(n) but it could be reasonable for small lists Di2015NewLine        // or if you're not sure about GetHashCode() implementation to do.Di2015NewLine        // If you want more speed you could return e.g. :Di2015NewLine        // return obj.Field1.GetHashCode() ^ (17 * obj.Field2.GetHashCode());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7709854Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool ListContentIsEqualInAnyOrder<T>(Di2015NewLinethis IEnumerable<T> list1, IEnumerable<T> list2, IEqualityComparer<T> comparer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var lookup1 = list1.ToLookup(x => x, comparer);Di2015NewLine    var lookup2 = list2.ToLookup(x => x, comparer);Di2015NewLine    if (lookup1.Count != lookup2.Count)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    return lookup1.All(el1 => lookup2.Contains(el1.Key) && Di2015NewLine            lookup2[el1.Key].Count() == el1.Count());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7710283Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyBindingList<T> : BindingList<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine    protected override void ApplySortCore(PropertyDescriptor prop,Di2015NewLine                                          ListSortDirection direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (prop.PropertyType.Equals(typeof(Image)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _SortPropertyCore = prop;Di2015NewLine            _SortDirectionCore = direction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var items = this.Items;Di2015NewLine            Func<T, object> func =Di2015NewLine                new Func<T, object>(t => (prop.GetValue(t) as Image).Tag);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (direction)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case ListSortDirection.Ascending:Di2015NewLine                    items = items.OrderBy(func).ToList();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case ListSortDirection.Descending:Di2015NewLine                    items = items.OrderByDescending(func).ToList();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ResetItems(items as List<T>);Di2015NewLine            ResetBindings();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ResetItems(List<T> items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.ClearItems();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int itemIndex = 0; itemIndex < items.Count; itemIndex++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.InsertItem(itemIndex, items[itemIndex]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7710505Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IHtmlString RadioButtonListFor<TModel, TValue>(this HtmlHelper<TModel> helper, Expression<Func<TModel, TValue>> expression, string list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string prefix = ExpressionHelper.GetExpressionText(expression);Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(prefix))Di2015NewLine            prefix = "empty";Di2015NewLine        int index = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var items = helper.ViewData.Eval(list) as IEnumerable;Di2015NewLine        if (items == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new NullReferenceException("Cannot find " + list + "in view data");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var validationAttributes = helper.GetUnobtrusiveValidationAttributes(prefix);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string txt = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string id = string.Format("{0}_{1}", prefix, index++).Replace('.','_');Di2015NewLine            TagBuilder tag = new TagBuilder("input"); Di2015NewLine            tag.MergeAttribute("type", "radio");Di2015NewLine            tag.MergeAttribute("name", prefix);Di2015NewLine            tag.MergeAttribute("id", id);Di2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, object> pair in validationAttributes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tag.MergeAttribute(pair.Key, pair.Value.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            txt += tag.ToString(TagRenderMode.Normal);Di2015NewLine            txt += item;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return helper.Raw(txt);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
7710505Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IHtmlString RadioButtonListFor<TModel, TValue>(this HtmlHelper<TModel> helper, Expression<Func<TModel, TValue>> expression, string list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string prefix = ExpressionHelper.GetExpressionText(expression);Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(prefix))Di2015NewLine            prefix = "empty";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // find existing value - if anyDi2015NewLine        string value = helper.ViewData.Eval(prefix) as string;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var validationAttributes = helper.GetUnobtrusiveValidationAttributes(prefix);Di2015NewLine        string txt = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create hidden field for error msg/valueDi2015NewLine        TagBuilder tagHidden = new TagBuilder("input");Di2015NewLine        tagHidden.MergeAttribute("type", "hidden");Di2015NewLine        tagHidden.MergeAttribute("name", prefix);Di2015NewLine        tagHidden.MergeAttribute("value", value);Di2015NewLine        tagHidden.MergeAttribute("id", prefix.Replace('.', '_'));Di2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, object> pair in validationAttributes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tagHidden.MergeAttribute(pair.Key, pair.Value.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        txt += tagHidden.ToString(TagRenderMode.Normal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // prepare to loop through itemsDi2015NewLine        int index = 0;Di2015NewLine        var items = helper.ViewData.Eval(list) as IDictionary<string, string>;Di2015NewLine        if (items == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new NullReferenceException("Cannot find " + list + "in view data");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create a radiobutton for each item. "Items" is a dictionary where the key contains the radiobutton value and the value contains the Radiobutton text/labelDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string id = string.Format("{0}_{1}", prefix, index++).Replace('.','_');Di2015NewLine            TagBuilder tag = new TagBuilder("input"); Di2015NewLine            tag.MergeAttribute("type", "radio");Di2015NewLine            tag.MergeAttribute("name", prefix);Di2015NewLine            tag.MergeAttribute("id", id);Di2015NewLine            tag.MergeAttribute("value", item.Key);Di2015NewLine            if (item.Key == value)Di2015NewLine                tag.MergeAttribute("checked", "true");Di2015NewLine            tag.MergeAttribute("onclick", "javascript:" + tagHidden.Attributes["id"] + ".value='" + item.Key + "'");Di2015NewLine            txt += tag.ToString(TagRenderMode.Normal);Di2015NewLine            txt += item.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return helper.Raw(txt);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7711297Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int[,] x = { { 1, 2, 3 }, { 4, 5, 6 } };Di2015NewLine        int[,] y = { { 7, 8, 9 }, { 10, 11, 12 } };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var xy = new StitchMatrix<int>(x, y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("0,0=" + xy[0, 0]); // 1Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("1,1=" + xy[1, 1]); // 5Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("1,2=" + xy[1, 2]); // 6Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("2,2=" + xy[2, 2]); // 9Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("3,2=" + xy[3, 2]); // 12Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass StitchMatrix<T> {Di2015NewLine    private T[][,] _matrices;Di2015NewLine    private int[] _lengths;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public StitchMatrix(params T[][,] matrices) {Di2015NewLine        // TODO: check they're all same size          Di2015NewLine        _matrices = matrices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // call uperbound once for speedDi2015NewLine        _lengths = _matrices.Select(m => m.GetUpperBound(0)).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T this[int x, int y] {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            // find the right matrixDi2015NewLine            int iMatrix = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (_lengths[iMatrix] < x) {Di2015NewLine                x -= (_lengths[iMatrix] + 1);Di2015NewLine                iMatrix++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // return value at cellDi2015NewLine            return _matrices[iMatrix][x, y];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7717670Di2015UniqueSeparator<%@ Page Language="C#" %>Di2015NewLine<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Di2015NewLine <head id="Head1" runat="server">Di2015NewLine   <script runat="server">Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void OnLoad(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    base.OnLoad(e);Di2015NewLine    if (!this.IsPostBack)Di2015NewLine        this.AddNodes(this.trvCategories.Nodes, 0, this.LoadData());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate void AddNodes(TreeNodeCollection nodes, int level, System.Data.DataTable dt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string filterExp = string.Format("ParentID='{0}'", level);Di2015NewLine    foreach (System.Data.DataRow r in dt.Select(filterExp))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode item = new TreeNode()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Text = r[1].ToString(),Di2015NewLine            Value = r[2].ToString()Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        this.AddNodes(item.ChildNodes, int.Parse(r[0].ToString()), dt);Di2015NewLine        nodes.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate System.Data.DataTable LoadData()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ///Di2015NewLine    /// For the simplicity I do build the datatable dynamically,Di2015NewLine    /// But you may get this data from the DATABASEDi2015NewLine    ///Di2015NewLine    System.Data.DataTable dt = new System.Data.DataTable();Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("ID", String.Empty.GetType());Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("[Name]", String.Empty.GetType());Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("[Value]", String.Empty.GetType());Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("ParentID", String.Empty.GetType());Di2015NewLine    dt.Columns.Add("[Order]", String.Empty.GetType());Di2015NewLine    int index = 9;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 1100; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string item = "{0},Item{1},Value{1},{2},{1}";Di2015NewLine        if (i < 110)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            index = i < 10 ? 0 : int.Parse(Math.Ceiling((decimal)i / 10).ToString());Di2015NewLine            dt.Rows.Add((string.Format(item, i + 1, i, index)).Split(char.Parse(",")));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i % 10 == 0) index++;Di2015NewLine            dt.Rows.Add((string.Format(item, i + 1, i, index)).Split(char.Parse(",")));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return dt;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7718811Di2015UniqueSeparatorWaitAny
7718811Di2015UniqueSeparatorWaitHandle[] handles = new WaitHandle[] { ShutdownEvent, ContinueEvent };Di2015NewLinewhile (true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int handle = WaitHandle.WaitAny(handles);  // wait for one of the eventsDi2015NewLine    if (handle == -1 || handle >= handles.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (handles[handle] = ShutdownEvent)Di2015NewLine       break;  // shutdown was signaledDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (handles[handle] == ContinueEvent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // download the next page and do something with the dataDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7720789Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void CheckTimes()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime start = DateTime.Parse("2011-10-08 12:30:00");Di2015NewLine        DateTime end = DateTime.Parse("2011-10-10 15:00:00");Di2015NewLine        // variable to use for bound checking (Date property sets the hour to 00)Di2015NewLine        DateTime boundscheck = start.Date;Di2015NewLine        // variable containing resultsDi2015NewLine        int timesFound = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This loop assumes we are only looking for one match per dayDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <= (end - start).Days; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // set the lower bound to yyyy-mm-dd 12:00:00Di2015NewLine            var lowerbound = boundscheck.Date.AddHours(12);Di2015NewLine            // set the upper bound to yyyy-mm-dd 13:00:00Di2015NewLine            var upperbound = lowerbound.AddHours(1);Di2015NewLine            //determine if bounds are within our start and end dateDi2015NewLine            if (lowerbound >= start && upperbound <= end)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                timesFound++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // increment boundscheck variable by one dayDi2015NewLine            boundscheck = boundscheck.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
7720808Di2015UniqueSeparator    public Bitmap Lighten(Bitmap bitmap, int amount)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (amount < -255 || amount > 255)Di2015NewLine    return bitmap;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // GDI+ still lies to us - the return format is BGR, NOT RGB.Di2015NewLine  BitmapData bmData = bitmap.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, bitmap.Width, bitmap.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int stride = bmData.Stride;Di2015NewLine  System.IntPtr Scan0 = bmData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int nVal = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  unsafeDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    byte* p = (byte*)(void*)Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int nOffset = stride - bitmap.Width * 3;Di2015NewLine    int nWidth = bitmap.Width * 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < bitmap.Height; ++y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      for (int x = 0; x < nWidth; ++x)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        nVal = (int)(p[0] + amount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (nVal < 0) nVal = 0;Di2015NewLine        if (nVal > 255) nVal = 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p[0] = (byte)nVal;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ++p;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      p += nOffset;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  bitmap.UnlockBits(bmData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return bitmap;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void btnLighten_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Bitmap image = pictureBox1.Image as Bitmap;Di2015NewLine  pictureBox1.Image = Lighten(image, 10);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void btnDarken_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Bitmap image = pictureBox1.Image as Bitmap;Di2015NewLine  pictureBox1.Image = Lighten(image, -10);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7723923Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class FluentToolsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Action<T, TValue> GetterToSetter<T, TValue>(Expression<Func<T, TValue>> getter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression parameter;Di2015NewLine        Expression instance;Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression propertyOrField;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GetMemberExpression(getter, out parameter, out instance, out propertyOrField);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Very simple case: p => p.Property or p => p.FieldDi2015NewLine        if (parameter == instance)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (propertyOrField.Member.MemberType == MemberTypes.Property)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // This is FASTER than Expression trees! (5x on my benchmarks) but works only on propertiesDi2015NewLine                PropertyInfo property = propertyOrField.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine                MethodInfo setter = property.GetSetMethod();Di2015NewLine                var action = (Action<T, TValue>)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<T, TValue>), setter);Di2015NewLine                return action;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            #region .NET 3.5Di2015NewLine            else // if (propertyOrField.Member.MemberType == MemberTypes.Field)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // 1.2x slower than 4.0 method, 5x faster than 3.5 methodDi2015NewLine                FieldInfo field = propertyOrField.Member as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine                var action = FieldSetter<T, TValue>(field);Di2015NewLine                return action;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            #endregionDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ParameterExpression value = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TValue), "val");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression expr = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region .NET 3.5Di2015NewLine        if (propertyOrField.Member.MemberType == MemberTypes.Property)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo property = propertyOrField.Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo setter = property.GetSetMethod();Di2015NewLine            expr = Expression.Call(instance, setter, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else // if (propertyOrField.Member.MemberType == MemberTypes.Field)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            expr = FieldSetter(propertyOrField, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //#region .NET 4.0Di2015NewLine        //// For field access it's 5x faster than the 3.5 method and 1.2x than "simple" method. For property access nearly same speed (1.1x faster).Di2015NewLine        //expr = Expression.Assign(propertyOrField, value);Di2015NewLine        //#endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Action<T, TValue>>(expr, parameter, value).Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void GetMemberExpression<T, U>(Expression<Func<T, U>> expression, out ParameterExpression parameter, out Expression instance, out MemberExpression propertyOrField)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression current = expression.Body;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (current.NodeType == ExpressionType.Convert || current.NodeType == ExpressionType.TypeAs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            current = (current as UnaryExpression).Operand;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (current.NodeType != ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        propertyOrField = current as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        current = propertyOrField.Expression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        instance = current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (current.NodeType != ExpressionType.Parameter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (current.NodeType == ExpressionType.Convert || current.NodeType == ExpressionType.TypeAs)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                current = (current as UnaryExpression).Operand;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (current.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                current = (current as MemberExpression).Expression;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        parameter = current as ParameterExpression;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region .NET 3.5Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Based on http://stackoverflow.com/questions/321650/how-do-i-set-a-field-value-in-an-c-expression-tree/321686#321686Di2015NewLine    private static Action<T, TValue> FieldSetter<T, TValue>(FieldInfo field)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DynamicMethod m = new DynamicMethod("setter", typeof(void), new Type[] { typeof(T), typeof(TValue) }, typeof(FluentTools));Di2015NewLine        ILGenerator cg = m.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // arg0.<field> = arg1Di2015NewLine        cg.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        cg.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLine        cg.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, field);Di2015NewLine        cg.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (Action<T, TValue>)m.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<T, TValue>));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Based on http://stackoverflow.com/questions/208969/assignment-in-net-3-5-expression-trees/3972359#3972359Di2015NewLine    private static Expression FieldSetter(Expression left, Expression right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        returnDi2015NewLine            Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                null,Di2015NewLine                typeof(FluentTools)Di2015NewLine                    .GetMethod("AssignTo", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Static)Di2015NewLine                    .MakeGenericMethod(left.Type),Di2015NewLine                left,Di2015NewLine                right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void AssignTo<T>(ref T left, T right)  // note the 'ref', which isDi2015NewLine    {                                                     // important when assigningDi2015NewLine        left = right;                                     // to value types!Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7724017Di2015UniqueSeparator    public string DoPing<T>(T IP)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(T) == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return DoPingString((String)Convert.ChangeType(IP, typeof(String)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(T) == typeof(IPAddress))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return DoPingIP((IPAddress)Convert.ChangeType(IP, typeof(IPAddress)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Programmer Error");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
7724017Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string DoPing(Object IP)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (IP.GetType() == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return DoPingString((String)IP);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (IP.GetType() == typeof(IPAddress))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return DoPingIP((IPAddress)IP);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("Programmer Error");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7728000Di2015UniqueSeparatorSub UnusedRow()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDim lStartRow As LongDi2015NewLineDim lUnusedRow As LongDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelStartRow = 3  'starting row no in case you have blank rows at the topDi2015NewLinelUnusedRow = lStartRow - 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineApplication.ScreenUpdating = FalseDi2015NewLineOn Error Resume NextDi2015NewLineDo While lStartRow = lUnusedRow + 1Di2015NewLine    lUnusedRow = lStartRowDi2015NewLine    lStartRow = Cells.Find("*", Cells(lUnusedRow, 1), , , xlByRows, xlNext).Row + 1Di2015NewLineLoopDi2015NewLineOn Error GoTo 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineApplication.ScreenUpdating = TrueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

7730514Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static float LengthSquared(PointF P1, PointF P2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (P1.X - P2.X) * (P1.X - P2.X)Di2015NewLine        + (P1.Y - P2.Y) * (P1.Y - P2.Y);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7730514Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Segment Closest_BruteForce(PointF P1, List<PointF> points)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PointF closest = null;Di2015NewLine    float minDist = float.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    foreach(PointF P2 in points) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       if(P1 != P2) Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           float temp = LengthSquared(P1, P2);Di2015NewLine           if(temp < minDist) Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               minDist = temp;Di2015NewLine               closest = P2;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new Segment(P1, closest);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7730514Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Segment Closest_BruteForce(List<PointF> points)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PointF closest1;Di2015NewLine    PointF closest2;Di2015NewLine    float minDist = float.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    for(int x=0; x<points.Count; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PointF P1 = points[x];Di2015NewLine        for(int y = x + 1; y<points.Count; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PointF P2 = points[y];Di2015NewLine            float temp = LengthSquared(P1, P2);Di2015NewLine            if(temp < minDist) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               minDist = temp;Di2015NewLine               closest1 = P1;Di2015NewLine               closest2 = P2;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new Segment(closest1, closest2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7731163Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Point? findmatch(int[] haystack, int[] needle)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var firstpixel = needle[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < haystack_height - needle_height; y++)Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < haystack_width - needle_width; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (haystack[y * haystack_width + x] == firstpixel)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var matched = checkmatch(haystack, needle, x, y);Di2015NewLine                if (matched)Di2015NewLine                    return (new Point(x, y));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7731163Di2015UniqueSeparatorfindmatch

7731163Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate int[] screenshot(int x, int y, int width, int height)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // dispose 'bmp' after useDi2015NewLine    using (var bmp = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // dispose 'g' after useDi2015NewLine        using (var g = Graphics.FromImage(bmp))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            g.CopyFromScreen(x, y, 0, 0, bmp.Size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var bmd = bmp.LockBits(Di2015NewLine                new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height),Di2015NewLine                ImageLockMode.ReadOnly,Di2015NewLine                bmp.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var ptr = bmd.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // as David pointed out, "bytes" might beDi2015NewLine            // a bit misleading name for a length ofDi2015NewLine            // a 32-bit int array (so I've changed it to "len")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var len = bmd.Stride * bmp.Height / 4;Di2015NewLine            var result = new int[len];Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(ptr, result, 0, len);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7731188Di2015UniqueSeparator// Please note: this isn't nice code, and it's not meant to be. It's just quickDi2015NewLine// and dirty to demonstrate the point.Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static byte[] buffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] arg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TcpClient client = new TcpClient("www.yoda.arachsys.com", 80);Di2015NewLine        NetworkStream stream = client.GetStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string text = "GET / HTTP/1.1\\r\\nHost: yoda.arachsys.com:80\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine            "Content-Length: 0\\r\\n\\r\\n";Di2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(text);Di2015NewLine        stream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        stream.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        buffer = new byte[1024 * 1024];Di2015NewLine        stream.BeginRead(buffer, 0, buffer.Length, ReadCallback, stream);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void ReadCallback(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stream stream = (Stream) ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine        int bytesRead = stream.EndRead(ar);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(bytesRead);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Asynchronous read:");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Encoding.ASCII.GetString(buffer, 0, bytesRead));Di2015NewLine        string text = "Bad request\\r\\n";Di2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(text);Di2015NewLine        stream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        stream.Flush();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Synchronous:");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(stream);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(reader.ReadToEnd());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7732001Di2015UniqueSeparatorStartService()
7732001Di2015UniqueSeparatorStopService()
7732001Di2015UniqueSeparatorRestartService()
7732001Di2015UniqueSeparatorService
7732001Di2015UniqueSeparatorRefresh()
7732001Di2015UniqueSeparatorStatus
7732001Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void RestartServiceWithDependents(ServiceController service, TimeSpan timeout)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int tickCount1 = Environment.TickCount; // record when the task startedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get a list of all services that depend on this one (including nestedDi2015NewLine    //  dependencies)Di2015NewLine    ServiceController[] dependentServices = service.DependentServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Restart the base service - will stop dependent services firstDi2015NewLine    RestartService(service, timeout);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Restore dependent services to their previous state - works because noDi2015NewLine    //  Refresh() has taken place on this collection, so while the dependentDi2015NewLine    //  services themselves may have been stopped in the meantime, theirDi2015NewLine    //  previous state is preserved in the collection.Di2015NewLine    foreach (ServiceController dependentService in dependentServices)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // record when the previous task "ended"Di2015NewLine        int tickCount2 = Environment.TickCount;Di2015NewLine        // update remaining timeoutDi2015NewLine        timeout.Subtract(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(tickCount2 - tickCount1));Di2015NewLine        // update task start timeDi2015NewLine        tickCount1 = tickCount2;Di2015NewLine        switch (dependentService.Status)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ServiceControllerStatus.Stopped:Di2015NewLine            case ServiceControllerStatus.StopPending:Di2015NewLine                // This Stop/StopPending section isn't really necessary in thisDi2015NewLine                //  case as it doesn't *do* anything, but it's included forDi2015NewLine                //  completeness & to make the code easier to understand...Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ServiceControllerStatus.Running:Di2015NewLine            case ServiceControllerStatus.StartPending:Di2015NewLine                StartService(dependentService, timeout);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ServiceControllerStatus.Paused:Di2015NewLine            case ServiceControllerStatus.PausePending:Di2015NewLine                StartService(dependentService, timeout);Di2015NewLine                // I don't "wait" here for pause, but you can if you want to...Di2015NewLine                dependentService.Pause();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7732046Di2015UniqueSeparatorfake.GroupJoin(real, f => f.Year, r => r.Year, (f, joinResult) => new {f, joinResult})Di2015NewLine    .SelectMany(@t => @t.joinResult.DefaultIfEmpty(), (@t, r) => (r == null ? @t.f : r));Di2015NewLine

7732673Di2015UniqueSeparator// implements `IEquatable` for a list of parametersDi2015NewLineclass Parameters : IEquatable<Parameters>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object[] _parameters;Di2015NewLine    public Parameters(object[] parms)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _parameters = parms;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IEquatable<Parameters> MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(Parameters other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (other == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_parameters.Length != other._parameters.Length)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // check each parameter to see if it's equalDi2015NewLine        // ...     Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Equals(obj as Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    { ... }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7732673Di2015UniqueSeparator// contains cached results for a single serviceDi2015NewLineclass CachedCallInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Func<object[], object> _method;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<Parameters, object> _cacheDi2015NewLine        = new Dictionary<Parameters, object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CachedCallInfo(Func<object[], object> method)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _method = method;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T GetResult<T>(params object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // use out Parameters class to ensure comparisonDi2015NewLine        // by valueDi2015NewLine        var key = new Parameters(parameters);Di2015NewLine        object result = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // result exists?Di2015NewLine        if (!_cache.TryGetValue(key, out result))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // do the actual service callDi2015NewLine            result = _method(parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add to cacheDi2015NewLine            _cache.Add(key, result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (T)result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7732673Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ServiceCacheDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<string, CachedCallInfo> _services =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<string, CachedCallInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RegisterService(string name, Func<object[], object> method)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _services[name] = new CachedCallInfo(method);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // "params" keyword is used to simplify method callsDi2015NewLine    public T GetResult<T>(string serviceName, params object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _services[serviceName].GetResult<T>(parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7735414Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace UnicodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// http://anubis.dkuug.dk/JTC1/SC2/WG2/docs/n1335Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// http://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/~mgk25/ucs/ISO-10646-UTF-8.htmlDi2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// http://www.unicode.org/versions/corrigendum1.htmlDi2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2279.txtDi2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class Utf8Checker : IUtf8CheckerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public bool Check(string fileName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (BufferedStream fstream = new BufferedStream(File.OpenRead(fileName)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return this.IsUtf8(fstream);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Check if stream is utf8 encoded.Di2015NewLine        /// Notice: stream is read completely in memory!Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="stream">Stream to read from.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>True if the whole stream is utf8 encoded.</returns>Di2015NewLine        public bool IsUtf8(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int count = 4 * 1024;Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer;Di2015NewLine            int read;Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                buffer = new byte[count];Di2015NewLine                stream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine                read = stream.Read(buffer, 0, count);Di2015NewLine                if (read < count)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                buffer = null;Di2015NewLine                count *= 2;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return IsUtf8(buffer, read);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="buffer"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="length"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static bool IsUtf8(byte[] buffer, int length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int position = 0;Di2015NewLine            int bytes = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (position < length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!IsValid(buffer, position, length, ref bytes))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                position += bytes;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="buffer"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="position"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="length"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="bytes"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static bool IsValid(byte[] buffer, int position, int length, ref int bytes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (length > buffer.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Invalid length");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (position > length - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bytes = 0;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte ch = buffer[position];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ch <= 0x7F)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bytes = 1;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ch >= 0xc2 && ch <= 0xdf)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (position >= length - 2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bytes = 0;Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (buffer[position + 1] < 0x80 || buffer[position + 1] > 0xbf)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bytes = 0;Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                bytes = 2;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ch == 0xe0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (position >= length - 3)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bytes = 0;Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (buffer[position + 1] < 0xa0 || buffer[position + 1] > 0xbf ||Di2015NewLine                    buffer[position + 2] < 0x80 || buffer[position + 2] > 0xbf)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bytes = 0;Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                bytes = 3;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ch >= 0xe1 && ch <= 0xef)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (position >= length - 3)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bytes = 0;Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (buffer[position + 1] < 0x80 || buffer[position + 1] > 0xbf ||Di2015NewLine                    buffer[position + 2] < 0x80 || buffer[position + 2] > 0xbf)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bytes = 0;Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bytes = 3;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ch == 0xf0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (position >= length - 4)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bytes = 0;Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine 7737843Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string HttpPost(string url, params object[] postData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder post = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < postData.Length; i += 2)Di2015NewLine         post.Append(string.Format("{0}{1}={2}", i == 0 ? "" : "&", postData[i], postData[i + 1]));Di2015NewLine    return HttpPost(url, post.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static string HttpPost(string url, string postData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    postData = postData.Replace("\\r\\n", "");Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         WebRequest req = WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine         byte[] send = Encoding.Default.GetBytes(postData);Di2015NewLine         req.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine         req.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine         req.ContentLength = send.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         Stream sout = req.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine         sout.Write(send, 0, send.Length);Di2015NewLine         sout.Flush();Di2015NewLine         sout.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         WebResponse res = req.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine         StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(res.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine         string returnvalue = sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine         return returnvalue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         Debug.WriteLine("POST Error on {0}\\n  {1}", url, ex.Message);Di2015NewLine         return "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7741262Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void textBox1_TextChanged(object sender, TextChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var currentText = textBox1.Text;Di2015NewLine        var selectionStart = textBox1.SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine        var selectionLength = textBox1.SelectionLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int nextAsterisk;Di2015NewLine        while ((nextAsterisk = currentText.IndexOf('*')) != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (nextAsterisk < selectionStart)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                selectionStart--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (nextAsterisk < selectionStart + selectionLength)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                selectionLength--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            currentText = currentText.Remove(nextAsterisk, 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (textBox1.Text != currentText)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            textBox1.Text = currentText;Di2015NewLine            textBox1.SelectionStart = selectionStart;Di2015NewLine            textBox1.SelectionLength = selectionLength;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7741474Di2015UniqueSeparatorInt32 reps = 10000000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Block1(int myFlag)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    String width;Di2015NewLine    String height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine    sw.Start();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < reps; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (myFlag == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            width = String.Format("{0:g}%", 60);Di2015NewLine            height = String.Format("{0:g}%", 60);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            width = String.Format("{0:g}%", 80);Di2015NewLine            height = String.Format("{0:g}%", 80);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    Double time = (Double)sw.Elapsed.Ticks / Stopwatch.Frequency * 1000000000.0 / reps;Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show(time.ToString() + " ns");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Block2(int myFlag)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    String width;Di2015NewLine    String height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine    sw.Start();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < reps; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        width = String.Format("{0:g}%", 80);Di2015NewLine        height = String.Format("{0:g}%", 80);Di2015NewLine        if (myFlag == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            width = String.Format("{0:g}%", 60);Di2015NewLine            height = String.Format("{0:g}%", 60);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Double time = (Double)sw.Elapsed.Ticks / Stopwatch.Frequency * 1000000000.0 / reps;Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show(time.ToString() + " ns");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7753509Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class StringFromIntDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public enum FormatStyleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Kilo = 1000,Di2015NewLine        Mega = 1000000Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int Number;Di2015NewLine    public FormatStyle FormatDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (LimitValueBeforeConversion)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 1000: return FormatStyle.Kilo;Di2015NewLine                case 1000000: return FormatStyle.Mega;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    throw new NotImplementedException("You must implement the code for this kind of value");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value == FormatStyle.Kilo)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                LimitValueBeforeConversion = 1000;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (value == FormatStyle.Mega)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                LimitValueBeforeConversion = 1000000;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int LimitValueBeforeConversionDi2015NewLine    { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator int(StringFromInt s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return s.Number;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator StringFromInt(int number)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringFromInt s = new StringFromInt(number);Di2015NewLine        return s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ConstructorsDi2015NewLine    public StringFromInt(int number, FormatStyle format)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Number = number;Di2015NewLine        Format = format;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public StringFromInt(int number)Di2015NewLine        : this(number, FormatStyle.Kilo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (number >= 1000000)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Format = FormatStyle.Mega;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Number >= LimitValueBeforeConversion)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string formatString = "0.#k";Di2015NewLine            switch (Format)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case FormatStyle.Kilo:Di2015NewLine                    formatString = "0.#k";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case FormatStyle.Mega:Di2015NewLine                    formatString = "0.#m";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    throw new NotImplementedException("You must implement the code for this kind of value");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return ((double)Number / LimitValueBeforeConversion).ToString(formatString);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Number.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7756679Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<string> EnumerateFilesRecursive(string root,string pattern="*")Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var todo = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine    todo.Enqueue(root);Di2015NewLine    while (todo.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string dir = todo.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        string[] subdirs = new string[0];Di2015NewLine        string[] files = new string[0];Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            subdirs = Directory.GetDirectories(dir);Di2015NewLine            files = Directory.GetFiles(dir, pattern);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (IOException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (System.UnauthorizedAccessException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string subdir in subdirs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            todo.Enqueue(subdir);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (string filename in files)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return filename;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7757649Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class LinqQueriesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo miTL = typeof(String).GetMethod("ToLower", Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo miS = typeof(String).GetMethod("StartsWith", new Type[] { typeof(String) });Di2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo miC = typeof(String).GetMethod("Contains", new Type[] { typeof(String) });Di2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo miE = typeof(String).GetMethod("EndsWith", new Type[] { typeof(String) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IQueryable<T> FilterByString<T>(this IQueryable<T> query,Di2015NewLine                                                  Expression<Func<T, string>> propertySelector,Di2015NewLine                                                  StringOperator operand,Di2015NewLine                                                  string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression parameterExpression = null;Di2015NewLine        var memberExpression = GetMemberExpression(propertySelector.Body, out parameterExpression);Di2015NewLine        var dynamicExpression = Expression.Call(memberExpression, miTL);Di2015NewLine        Expression constExp = Expression.Constant(value.ToLower());Di2015NewLine        switch (operand)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case StringOperator.StartsWith:Di2015NewLine                dynamicExpression = Expression.Call(dynamicExpression, miS, constExp);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case StringOperator.Contains:Di2015NewLine                dynamicExpression = Expression.Call(dynamicExpression, miC, constExp);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case StringOperator.EndsWith:Di2015NewLine                dynamicExpression = Expression.Call(dynamicExpression, miE, constExp);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var pred = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(dynamicExpression, new[] { parameterExpression });Di2015NewLine        return query.Where(pred);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Expression GetMemberExpression(Expression expression, out ParameterExpression parameterExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        parameterExpression = null;Di2015NewLine        if (expression is MemberExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var memberExpression = expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            while (!(memberExpression.Expression is ParameterExpression))Di2015NewLine                memberExpression = memberExpression.Expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            parameterExpression = memberExpression.Expression as ParameterExpression;Di2015NewLine            return expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (expression is MethodCallExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var methodCallExpression = expression as MethodCallExpression;Di2015NewLine            parameterExpression = methodCallExpression.Object as ParameterExpression;Di2015NewLine            return methodCallExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7765354Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GetPropertiesMaxLength(object obj) {Di2015NewLine  int totalMaxLength=0;Di2015NewLine  Type type = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine  PropertyInfo[] info = type.GetProperties();Di2015NewLine  foreach (PropertyInfo property in info) {Di2015NewLine     if (property.PropertyType == typeof(string)) {Di2015NewLine       string value = property.GetValue(obj, null) as string;Di2015NewLine       totalMaxLength += value.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return totalMaxLength;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

             if (textBox == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                            throw new ArgumentNullException("textBox");Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("textBox");Di2015NewLine                    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return textBox.GetValue(MaskExpressionProperty) as DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                    var textBox = dependencyObject as TextBox;Di2015NewLine                    var mask = e.NewValue as string;Di2015NewLine                    textBox.PreviewTextInput -= textBox_PreviewTextInput;Di2015NewLine                    textBox.PreviewKeyDown -= textBox_PreviewKeyDown;Di2015NewLine                    DataObject.RemovePastingHandler(textBox, Pasting);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (mask == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private static void textBox_PreviewTextInput(object sender, TextCompositionEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                    var textBox =     {Di2015NewLine                            return;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    var proposedText = GetProposedText(textBox, e.Text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (!maskExpression.IsMatch(proposedText))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                            e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private static void textBox_PreviewKeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine (maskExpression == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                            return;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //pressing space doesn't raise PreviewTextInput - no idea why, but we need to handleDi2015NewLine                    //explicitly hereDi2015NewLine                    if (e.Key == Key.Space)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                            var proposedText = GetProposedText(textBox, " ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if (!maskExpression.IsMatch(proposedText))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                    e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine (maskExpression == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                            return;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (e.DataObject.GetDataPresent(typeof(string)))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                            var pastedText = e.DataObject.GetData(typeof(string)) as string;Di2015NewLine                            var proposedText = GetProposedText(textBox, pastedText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if (!maskExpression.IsMatch(proposedText))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                    e.CancelCommand();Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                            e.CancelCommand();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    text = text.Insert(textBox.CaretIndex, newText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return text;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine 7767341Di2015UniqueSeparatorTo shuffle an array a of n elements (indexes 0..n-1):Di2015NewLine  for i from n  1 downto 1 doDi2015NewLine       j ? random integer with 0  j  iDi2015NewLine       exchange a[j] and a[i]Di2015NewLine
7767341Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandom rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = questions.Length - 1; i >= 1; i--)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Random.Next generates numbers between min and max - 1 value, so we have to balance thisDi2015NewLine    int j = rnd.Next(0, i + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (i != j)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var temp = questions[i];Di2015NewLine        questions[i] = questions[j];Di2015NewLine        questions[j] = temp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7771176Di2015UniqueSeparator//Call to create a new user and return the IDDi2015NewLinepublic static Guid? CreateUser(MyDataContext DB, string UserName, string Password, string Email, string PasswordQuestion, string PasswordAnswer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string salt = GenerateSalt();Di2015NewLine    string password = EncodePassword(Password, salt);Di2015NewLine    string encodedPasswordAnswer = EncodePassword(PasswordAnswer.ToLower(), salt);Di2015NewLine    DateTime dt = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Guid? newUserID = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //res would contain the success or fail code from the stored procedureDi2015NewLine    //0 = success; 1 = fail;Di2015NewLine    int res = DB.aspnet_Membership_CreateUser(  "[My app name]", UserName, password, salt, Email, PasswordQuestion, encodedPasswordAnswer, true, dt, DateTime.Now, 0, 1, ref newUserID);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newUserID;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string GenerateSalt()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buf = new byte[16];Di2015NewLine    (new RNGCryptoServiceProvider()).GetBytes(buf);Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(buf);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static string EncodePassword(string pass, string salt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] bIn = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(pass);Di2015NewLine    byte[] bSalt = Convert.FromBase64String(salt);Di2015NewLine    byte[] bRet = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HashAlgorithm hm = HashAlgorithm.Create("SHA1");Di2015NewLine    if (hm is KeyedHashAlgorithm)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        KeyedHashAlgorithm kha = (KeyedHashAlgorithm)hm;Di2015NewLine        if (kha.Key.Length == bSalt.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            kha.Key = bSalt;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (kha.Key.Length < bSalt.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] bKey = new byte[kha.Key.Length];Di2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(bSalt, 0, bKey, 0, bKey.Length);Di2015NewLine            kha.Key = bKey;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] bKey = new byte[kha.Key.Length];Di2015NewLine            for (int iter = 0; iter < bKey.Length; )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int len = Math.Min(bSalt.Length, bKey.Length - iter);Di2015NewLine                Buffer.BlockCopy(bSalt, 0, bKey, iter, len);Di2015NewLine                iter += len;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            kha.Key = bKey;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        bRet = kha.ComputeHash(bIn);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] bAll = new byte[bSalt.Length + bIn.Length];Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(bSalt, 0, bAll, 0, bSalt.Length);Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(bIn, 0, bAll, bSalt.Length, bIn.Length);Di2015NewLine        bRet = hm.ComputeHash(bAll);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(bRet);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7772087Di2015UniqueSeparator#include <iostream>Di2015NewLine#include <vector>Di2015NewLine#include <ctime>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing namespace std;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetypedef struct point3dDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double x, y, z;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    point3d(double x, double y, double z)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this->x = x;Di2015NewLine        this->y = y;Di2015NewLine        this->z = z;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} point3d_t;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid runTest()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int numPoints = 100000;Di2015NewLine    const int numIters = 100000000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    vector<point3d_t> pts;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < numPoints; i++) pts.push_back(point3d_t(i, i + 1, i + 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    auto begin = clock();Di2015NewLine    double sum = 0.0, dum = 0.0;Di2015NewLine    point3d_t u(1, 2, 3);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < numIters; i++) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        point3d_t v = pts[i % numPoints];Di2015NewLine        sum += u.x * v.x + u.y * v.y + u.z * v.z;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    auto end = clock();Di2015NewLine    cout << "Sum: " << sum << " Time elapsed: " << double(std::difftime(end,begin)) << " ms" << endl;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) runTest();Di2015NewLine    return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7774798Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override void PaintPoint(Layer layer, Point position)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Rasterise the pencil toolDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Assume it is squareDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check the pixel to be set is witin the bounds of the layerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the tool size rect to the locate on of the point to be paintedDi2015NewLine        m_toolArea.Location = position;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the area to be paintedDi2015NewLine        Rectangle areaToPaint = new Rectangle();Di2015NewLine        areaToPaint = Rectangle.Intersect(layer.GetRectangle(), m_toolArea);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Bitmap bmp;Di2015NewLine        BitmapData data = bmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLine        int stride = data.Stride;Di2015NewLine        unsafeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte* ptr = (byte*)data.Scan0;Di2015NewLine            // Check this is not a null areaDi2015NewLine            if (!areaToPaint.IsEmpty)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Go through the draw area and set the pixels as they should beDi2015NewLine                for (int y = areaToPaint.Top; y < areaToPaint.Bottom; y++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int x = areaToPaint.Left; x < areaToPaint.Right; x++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // layer.GetBitmap().SetPixel(x, y, m_colour);Di2015NewLine                        ptr[(x * 3) + y * stride] = m_colour.B;Di2015NewLine                        ptr[(x * 3) + y * stride + 1] = m_colour.G;Di2015NewLine                        ptr[(x * 3) + y * stride + 2] = m_colour.R;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        bmp.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7777904Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string PropertyName<T1, T2>(this Expression<Func<T1, T2>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression member = null;Di2015NewLine        if (expression.Body is MemberExpression)Di2015NewLine            member = expression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (expression.Body is UnaryExpression && expression.Body.NodeType == ExpressionType.Convert)Di2015NewLine            member = ((UnaryExpression)expression.Body).Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (member == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Selector must point to a property or field.", "expression");Di2015NewLine        return member.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7778156Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ScreenshotDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets a JPG "screenshot" of the current UIElementDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source">UIElement to screenshot</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="scale">Scale to render the screenshot</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="quality">JPG Quality</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Byte array of JPG data</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] GetJpgImage(this UIElement source, double scale, int quality)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double actualHeight = source.RenderSize.Height;Di2015NewLine        double actualWidth = source.RenderSize.Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double renderHeight = actualHeight * scale;Di2015NewLine        double renderWidth = actualWidth * scale;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RenderTargetBitmap renderTarget = new RenderTargetBitmap((int) renderWidth, (int) renderHeight, 96, 96, PixelFormats.Pbgra32);Di2015NewLine        VisualBrush sourceBrush = new VisualBrush(source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DrawingVisual drawingVisual = new DrawingVisual();Di2015NewLine        DrawingContext drawingContext = drawingVisual.RenderOpen();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (drawingContext)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            drawingContext.PushTransform(new ScaleTransform(scale, scale));Di2015NewLine            drawingContext.DrawRectangle(sourceBrush, null, new Rect(new Point(0, 0), new Point(actualWidth, actualHeight)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        renderTarget.Render(drawingVisual);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        JpegBitmapEncoder jpgEncoder = new JpegBitmapEncoder();Di2015NewLine        jpgEncoder.QualityLevel = quality;Di2015NewLine        jpgEncoder.Frames.Add(BitmapFrame.Create(renderTarget));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Byte[] _imageArray;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream outputStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            jpgEncoder.Save(outputStream);Di2015NewLine            _imageArray = outputStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _imageArray;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7778226Di2015UniqueSeparator// Handler interfaceDi2015NewLineinterface IHandles<T> where T : ICommand {Di2015NewLine    void Handle(T command);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Bus interfaceDi2015NewLineinterface IBus {Di2015NewLine    void Publish<T>(T cmd) where T : ICommand;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Bus implementationDi2015NewLineclass BusImpl : IBus {Di2015NewLine    public void Publish<T>(T cmd) where T : ICommand {Di2015NewLine        var handler = (IHandles<T>)IoC.Resolve(typeof(IHandles<T>));Di2015NewLine        handler.Handle(cmd);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7778226Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublish

7778949Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // This is the attribute that we will apply to the fieldsDi2015NewLine   // for which we want to specify an option name.Di2015NewLine   [AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Field)]Di2015NewLine   public class OptionNameAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      public OptionNameAttribute(string optionName)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         OptionName = optionName;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      public string OptionName { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // This is the class which will contain the option values that Di2015NewLine   // we read from the file.Di2015NewLine   public class OptionContainerDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      [OptionName("Name")]Di2015NewLine      public string MyNameField;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      [OptionName("Value")]Di2015NewLine      public string MyValueField;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   class ProgramDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // SetOption is the method that assigns the value provided to the Di2015NewLine      // field of the specified instance with an OptionName attribute containingDi2015NewLine      // the specified optionName.Di2015NewLine      static void SetOption(object instance, string optionName, string optionValue)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // Get all the fields that has the OptionNameAttribute definedDi2015NewLine         IEnumerable<FieldInfo> optionFields = instance.GetType()Di2015NewLine            .GetFields()Di2015NewLine            .Where(field => field.IsDefined(typeof(OptionNameAttribute), true));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Find the single field where the OptionNameAttribute.OptionName propertyDi2015NewLine         // matches the provided optionName argument.Di2015NewLine         FieldInfo optionField = optionFields.SingleOrDefault(field =>Di2015NewLine            field.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(OptionNameAttribute), true)Di2015NewLine            .Cast<OptionNameAttribute>().Single().OptionName.Equals(optionName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // If the found field is null there is no such option.Di2015NewLine         if (optionField == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(String.Format("Unknown option {0}", optionName), "optionname");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Finally set the value.Di2015NewLine         optionField.SetValue(instance, optionValue);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         OptionContainer instance = new OptionContainer();Di2015NewLine         SetOption(instance, "Name", "This is the value of Name");Di2015NewLine         SetOption(instance, "Value", "This is my value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine(instance.MyNameField);Di2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine(instance.MyValueField);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
